property.title: Font Awesome URL:
property.description: Set to empty if some add-on is already including this font to avoid duplicate inclusion.

property.title: Glyphicons Pro URL:
property.description: Set to empty if some add-on is already including this font to avoid duplicate inclusion.

property.title: Wrap whole page in global content wrapper.
property.description: Below you can select components that you want to be included in wrapper.

property.title: Include header in global content wrapper.
property.description: Enabling this option will include navigation in global wrapper as well regardless of setting below.

property.title: Include navigation in global content wrapper.
Include footer in global content wrapper.
Global Wrapper Layout
property.description: Layout of wrapper around content area.

property.title: ├ Responsive
property.description: Layout for global wrapper for small screen devices.

property.title: Maximum page width (in pixels):
property.description: This option overrides @pageWidth.width property.

property.title: Enable simple breadcrumb layout.
property.description: If enabled, all breadcrumbs will be placed in one container with basic layout.

property.title: Display home icon before first breadcrumb.
property.description: Requires glyph fonts to be enabled (see "Options" style properties group).

property.title: Use only icon for first breadcrumb without text.
property.description: This option works only if previous option is enabled.

property.title: Container Block
property.description: Breadcrumb container for wrapped layout.

property.title: Use Font Awesome home icon instead of GlyphIcons Pro icon.
property.description: You might need to set font size to about 1.3em to use Font Awesome icon. You can change it by editing "Home Icon Layout" property.

property.title: Home Icon Layout
property.description: Layout for home icon. Works only if home icon is enabled. Set custom left position to change spacing between home breadcrumb text and icon. Set custom font size to make icon bigger or smaller.

property.title: └ Extra
property.description: Extra CSS to add to home icon's parent element. Works only if home icon option is enabled. Set custom left margin to add spacing between home breadcrumb text and left border.

property.title: Breadcrumb
property.description: Breadcrumb item layout.

property.title: Item Arrow
property.description: Arrow layout.

property.title: Enable compact nodes list
property.description: Nodes will be shown by several nodes per row. Compact nodes layout works only in browsers with JavaScript enabled.

property.title: Show last post in compact nodes
Categories that will use compact layout
property.description: Category node IDs, separated by comma. If value is empty and compact nodes are enabled, compact layout will be applied to all categories. Example value: 1,2,5

property.title: Compact nodes list break point
property.description: Minimum width of node in compact layout mode.

property.title: Tiny Icon - RSS
property.description: RSS icon layout. Works only if glyph fonts are enabled.

property.title: Tiny Icon - RSS, Hover
property.description: Hover status for RSS icon. Works only if glyph fonts are enabled.

property.title: Use glyphs for user tabs
property.description: Same as above. These options work only if glyph fonts are enabled.

property.title: List of glyph selectors for visitor tabs
property.description: Same as option above.

property.title: Use glyphs for navigation tabs
property.description: empty = only text (default), 1 = glyphs + text, 2 = only glyphs. Also you can add settings for specific icons by appending it to default value with comma like "0,selected=2" which means no icons for everything, only icon for selected tab.

property.title: List of glyph selectors for main navigation tabs
property.description: List of icons. Format: "tab=icon", where "tab" is list of classes. "Icon" is name of icon. FA icons are fa-icon, Glyph Icons icons are gi-icon where "icon" is specific icon name. One entry per line. Optional custom css after icon name separated by comma.

properties.property: home,portal=gi-home forums=gi-conversation,font-size:1.2em;top:3px; members=gi-group,padding-right:2px chat,taigachat=gi-chat resources=fa-cog,font-size:1.1em;top:1px; showcase=gi-camera gallery,xengallery,sonnb_xengallery,useralbums=fa-photo articles,ams,ubs=gi-book-open sportsbook=gi-podium stocktrader=gi-stats survivor=gi-ax pickem=gi-playing-dices calendar=fa-calendar classifieds=gi-newspaper

property.description: Defines how sub-forum link in sub-forums list is shown when option to show subforums popup is disabled.

property.title: Background color for blocks inside content blocks
HD Header Logo Image Path
property.description: High definition logo for high definition displays. Usually it is the same as main logo, but twice wider and twice taller. It must have same width/height ratio as main logo. Requires setting logo width and height properties.

property.title: Width of Header Logo
property.description: Enter the width in pixels of your logo image.

property.title: Scale down logo when browser window width is below logo width.
Center logo when window width is below
property.description: Enter 0 to never center logo, 1 to always center logo. Otherwise enter width in pixels below which you want logo to change position from left to center.

property.title: Scale header height with logo on small displays
property.description: Option works only if option to scale logo is enabled and logo width and height are set.

property.title: ├ High Definition Icon
property.description: High definition icon for forum. Icon should be twice bigger than normal icon. Background-size value should be twice smaller than high definition icon.

property.title: ├ High Definition Icon
property.description: High definition icon for forum with unread posts. Icon should be twice bigger than normal icon. Background-size value should be twice smaller than high definition icon.

property.title: ├ High Definition Icon
property.description: High definition icon for page. Icon should be twice bigger than normal icon. Background-size value should be twice smaller than high definition icon.

property.title: ├ High Definition Icon
property.description: High definition icon for link. Icon should be twice bigger than normal icon. Background-size value should be twice smaller than high definition icon.

property.title: Custom node icons list:
property.description: This style property requires Artodia Framework add-on.

property.title: Google Fonts:
property.description: Google fonts link. Set it to empty if you do not want to load any external fonts.

property.title: Color for border that separates parts of content blocks.

property.description: Extra properties to apply to node titles when moving mouse over it.

property.title: └ Alert

property.title: Moderator Bar Permission Test
property.description: Permission test link. To see it in action use option to test any user's permissions in admin control panel.

property.title: Jump Menu Trigger

Show second row of navigation links when user moves mouse above navigation.
property.description: This option is ignored if previous option is enabled.

property.title: Minimum window width:
property.description: If window width is below this setting, static navigation will be disabled. Minimum is 400px

property.title: Minimum window height:
property.description: If window height is below this setting static navigation will be disabled. Minimum is 300px

property.title: Tab Link, Last Tab
property.description: Style adjustments for the most right tab, such as left border radius.

property.title: └ Hover
property.description: Changes to page content wrapper layout for static navigation when mouse is above static navigation.

property.title: └ More Properties
property.description: Extra additions such as border color that default XenForo style does not support.

property.title: └ Bottom Breadcrumb

property.description: Style for default "Search..." text that is shown when input box is empty. Change only font color.

property.title: Controls Wrapper

property.title: └ Content Blocks

property.title: └ Login Section

property.description: Additions to @callToActionSpan inside breadcrumb. See @callToActionSpan property in Buttons style properties group.

property.description: Vertical padding between discussion list items. Use padding-top to set it.

property.description: This layout is best used when glyphs are assigned to each navigation tab. You can configure navigation glyphs in "header and navigation" section. Enabling this feature will change behavior of some other functions.

property.title: Main navigation position:
property.description: Spacing in pixels from top of header to navigation tabs. If empty, style will attempt to automatically calculate it to vertically center navigation.

property.title: Secondary navigation height:
property.description: Height of secondary navigation block:

property.title: Secondary Navigation Container
property.description: Layout for secondary navigation container. By default it uses same layout as simple breadcrumbs container, use this property to customize it without affecting breadcrumbs.

property.title: └ Wrapped
property.description: Changes to secondary navigation container when global wrapper is enabled.

property.title: Secondary Link Arrow Widget
property.description: Changes to arrow widget layout in secondary navigation row.

property.title: Move call-to-action button to title bar area.
property.description: If enabled, buttons such as "post new thread" will be moved to title bar area. It will work only if title bar exists on current page. You can customize layout in buttons section of style properties.

property.title: Title Bar Call-to-Action Button
property.description: Changes to button layout when its inside title bar. See option in "breadcrumbs" section of style properties.

property.title: Title Bar Call-to-Action Button, Hover
property.description: Changes to inner block in hover state.

property.title: ├ Additional Properties
property.description: Header property (previous property on this page) in XenForo is limited only to color and background color. This property extends that property allowing you more freedom.

property.title: Toggle sidebar on wide screens.
property.description: Add sidebar toggle to breadcrumb to allow user show or hide sidebar when its on right of content. Does not affect mobile devices when sidebar is below content.

property.title: Member Card Close Link
property.description: Adjustments to overlay close link for member card.

property.title: Tab Link, Open Popup, Link
property.description: Link inside opened popup.

property.title: Enable sidebar wrapper.
property.description: If enabled, sidebar will be wrapped in one block and layout of sections will slightly change.

property.title: Sidebar Wrapper
property.description: Layout of sidebar wrapper if wrapper is enabled.

property.title: Sidebar Section
property.description: Changes to sidebar section.

property.title: Wrapped Sidebar Section
property.description: Changes to sidebar section when sidebar wrapper is enabled.

property.title: Wrapped Sidebar Heading
property.description: Changes to block heading when sidebar wrapper is enabled.

property.title: Wrapped Sidebar Content
property.description: Changes to @primaryContent and @secondaryContent for sidebar when sidebar wrapper is enabled

property.title: Sidebar Content Block
property.description: Changes to @primaryContent and @secondaryContent inside sidebar.

property.title: ├ Odd Section
property.description: Changes to layout of odd section (such as different background color)

property.title: Move signup button outside of sidebar.
Signup Button
property.description: Changes to signup button layout inside wrapped sidebar.

property.title: Do not show forums as unread to guests
List of glyphs for categories.
property.description: This style property requires Artodia Framework add-on.

property.title: Tab, Even Child
property.description: Adjustments for even tab (2nd, 4th, etc..)

property.title: Use horizontal layout for messages.
property.description: If enabled, user profile will be shown above message instead of on side. All options below work only if this option is enabled.

property.title: Show sub-forums list outside of node block.
property.description: This option works only if option above is disabled.

property.title: └ Outside
property.description: Additions to previous property when sub-forums list is shown outside of node. Left margin is ignored, use left padding instead.

property.title: ├ Outside
property.description: Changes to previous property when sub-forums list is shown outside of node.

property.title: Show last post on mobile devices
Menu Icon
property.description: Layout of icon that triggers responsive menu.

property.title: Limit for sidebar width:
property.description: Limit for sidebar width on mobile devices. Works only if previous option is enabled.

property.title: New Indicator (Outer)
property.description: Changes to new message indicator layout for horizontal messages.

property.title: New Indicator (Inner)
property.description: Changes to new message indicator inner block layout for horizontal messages.

property.title: Main Content
property.description: This is used to enclose the message text and any other user-generated content for the message, such as attached files.

property.title: Hide poster profile block in quick reply editor.
Apply horizontal message layout only to first post.
Avatar Holder
property.description: Styles the block that surrounds the large avatar for a message author.

property.title: User Info Block
property.description: This unit directly encloses the avatar, username and other user info for a message.

property.title: Width and height of avatar:
property.description: Value in pixels. Value should not be larger than 96px.

property.title: Author Online Status Indicator
property.description: If enabled, this controls the appearance of the online status indicator on messages.

property.title: User Text Block
property.description: Styles the container for the author username and user title next to messages.

property.title: User Banner
property.description: Changes to layout of user banner.

property.title: Extra User Info
property.description: Controls the appearance of the (optional) extra user info that can be displayed under the message poster's avatar and username.

property.title: Empty Category Strip
property.description: Layout for empty category strip, without title. Also see option "hide empty category titles".

property.title: └ Wrapped
property.description: Message text block inside another block.

property.title: ├ Public
property.description: Changes to navigation tab layout for public tabs.

property.title: └ Visitor
property.description: Changes to navigation tab layout for visitors.

property.title: ├ Layout with header
property.description: Changes to wrapper layout when header is wrapped.

property.title: ├ Layout without header, with navigation
property.description: Changes to global wrapper layout when header is not wrapped, but navigation is wrapped.

property.title: └ Layout without navigation
property.description: Changes to wrapper layout when both header and navigation are not wrapped.

property.title: Tab link with glyph
property.description: Changes to tab link layout with glyph.

property.title: └ Visitor Tabs
property.description: Additions to previous property for visitor tabs

property.title: Tab link with glyph and text
property.description: Changes to tab link when both glyph and text are shown.

property.title: └ Visitor Tabs
property.description: Changes to previous property for visitor tab

property.title: ├ First Row
property.description: Changes to node layout for first node, such as removal of top border.

property.title: └ Last Row
property.description: Changes to node layout for last node, such as removal of bottom border.

property.title: Placeholder Color
property.description: Placeholder icon font color.

property.title: Search Bar Placeholder
property.description: Search bar placeholder color when global wrapper is enabled and icon is outside of wrapper.

property.title: Search Bar Input Box Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text color for search bar input box when global wrapper is enabled and search bar is outside of wrapped area.

property.title: Search Bar Input Box Placeholder, Hover
Enable alternative wrapper layout.
property.description: This option works only if content wrapper (see "Content Wrapper" group) is enabled and both header and navigation are not wrapped.

property.title: Page Layout
property.description: Changes to page layout when alternative header is enabled.

property.title: Enable tabbed navigation.
property.description: Enables all style properties in this properties group. This option cannot be used if alternative navigation (previous style properties group) is enabled.

property.title: Show glyphs in sidebar section titles.
property.description: If enabled, Font Awesome and Glyph Icons Pro glyphs will be placed before sidebar section titles wherever appropriate.

property.title: Add glyphs to buttons inside post.
property.description: This option affects buttons at the bottom of post, such as "edit", "delete", "like".

property.title: Scale navigation from left to right side of window.
property.description: This option does not work when alternative navigation or tabbed navigation is enabled.

property.title: Quick Search
property.description: Changes to quick search inside tabbed navigation.

property.title: ├ Query Field
property.description: Changes to quick search query field (such as background color) inside tabbed navigation.

property.title: Merge user tabs.
property.description: If enabled, all visitor tabs will be displayed as one big tab.

property.title: Use full page width.
property.description: Forces navigation to take all available width. Do not enable this option if you use option to wrap header or navigation into global wrapper (see "Content Wrapper" properties group).

property.title: Tabs Container Layout
property.description: Margin and padding for tabs container.

property.title: Tabs Container Background
property.description: Background for main tabs container.

property.title: ├ Full Width
property.description: Changes to previous property when full width navigation is enabled.

group.description: User banners layout

group.title: └ Horizontal Profile (vBulletin-like postbit)
group.description: Options for horizontal message layout.

templates.template:
node-{$breadcrumb.node_id}
{$xenOptions.boardTitle}
{xen:phrase home} {$homeTab.title} {$selectedTab.title} > {xen:raw $breadcrumb.value} >

<xen:set var="$useSprites">0</xen:set>
<xen:if is="!{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb} && {xen:property enableBreadcrumbSprites} && {xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURL} != ''"><xen:set var="$useSprites">1</xen:set></xen:if>

.breadBoxTop,
.breadBoxBottom
{
	{xen:property breadBox}
}

	.breadBoxTop
	{
		{xen:property breadBoxTop}

		<xen:if is="!{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && {xen:property globalWrapper}">
		padding-top: 0;
		</xen:if>
		<xen:if is="!{xen:property globalWrapper}">
		padding-top: 0;
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{$useSprites}">
		{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteBoxTop}
		</xen:if>
	}

	.breadBoxBottom
	{
		{xen:property breadBoxBottom}

		<xen:if is="{$useSprites}">
		{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteBoxBottom}
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperFooter}">
		padding-bottom: 0;
		</xen:if>
		<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} !== '1'">
		margin-bottom: 0;
		</xen:if>
	}

	.breadBoxTop > nav:after,
	.breadBoxBottom > nav:after
	{
		content: '';
		clear: both;
		display: block;
	}

.breadBoxTop .topCtrl
{
	{xen:property breadBoxTopCtrl}
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
.breadcrumb
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayout}
}
<xen:else />
.breadcrumb
{
	{xen:property breadcrumb}

	<xen:if is="{$useSprites}">
	height: {xen:property breadcrumbSpriteBlockHeight};
	</xen:if>
}
</xen:if>

.breadcrumb.showAll
{
	height: auto;
}

.breadcrumb .boardTitle
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbBoardTitle}
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
.breadcrumb .crumbs
{
	line-height: {xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayout.height};
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayoutCrumbs}
}

.breadcrumb .crust
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayoutCrust}
}

.breadcrumb .crust:before
{
	content: '>';
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayoutArrow}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child:before,
	.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb:before
	{
		display: none;
	}

.breadcrumb .crumb
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayoutCrumb}
}

.breadcrumb .crumb:hover
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayoutCrumbHover}
}

.breadcrumb .arrow
{
	display: none;
}

@media (max-width: 450px)
{
	.breadcrumb .crumb span
	{
		display: inline-block;
		max-width: 150px;
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
		vertical-align: top;
		white-space: nowrap;
	}
}

@media (max-width: 400px)
{
	.breadcrumb .crumb span
	{
		max-width: 120px;
	}
}

<xen:elseif is="{$useSprites}" />
.breadcrumb .crust
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteCrust}
}

<xen:set var="$url">{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURL}{xen:if '{$pageIsRtl}', '-rtl'}</xen:set>
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb,
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:before,
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:after
{
	cursor: pointer;
	text-decoration: none;
	outline: 0 none;
	display: block;
	height: {xen:property breadcrumbSpriteBlockHeight};
	line-height: {xen:property breadcrumbSpriteBlockHeight};
	background: transparent url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}.png') 0 0 repeat-x;
	background-size: 20px 250px;
}

	.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb
	{
		margin: 0;
		margin-left: 20px;
		position: relative;

		{xen:property breadcrumSpriteCrumb}
	}

		.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb
		{
			{xen:property breadcrumSpriteCrumbOdd}
		}

		.breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb
		{
			{xen:property breadcrumSpriteCrumbLast}
		}

		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover
		{
			{xen:property breadcrumSpriteCrumbHover}
		}

	.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:before,
	.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:after
	{
		content: '';
		display: block;
		position: absolute;
		top: 0;
		bottom: 0;
		width: 20px;
		pointer-events: none;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
	}

		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:before
		{
			left: -20px;
			background-position: 0 -150px;
		}

			.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb:before,
			.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb a.crumb:before
			{
				background-position: 0 -200px;
			}

		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:after
		{
			right: -20px;
			background-position: 0 -50px;
		}

			.breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb:after
			{
				background-position: 0 -100px;
			}

	@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 1.5dppx)
	{
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb,
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:before,
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:after
		{
			background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}-hd.png');
		}
	}

<xen:if is="{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURLOdd} != ''">
<xen:set var="$url">{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURLOdd}{xen:if '{$pageIsRtl}', '-rtl'}</xen:set>
.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb,
.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb:before,
.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb:after
{
	background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}.png');
}

	@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 1.5dppx)
	{
		.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb,
		.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb:before,
		.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb:after
		{
			background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}-hd.png');
		}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURLHover} != ''">
<xen:set var="$url">{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteURLHover}{xen:if '{$pageIsRtl}', '-rtl'}</xen:set>
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover,
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover:before,
.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover:after
{
	background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}.png');
}

	@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 1.5dppx)
	{
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover,
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover:before,
		.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb:hover:after
		{
			background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/{xen:raw $url}-hd.png');
		}
	}
</xen:if>

.breadcrumb .crust .arrow
{
	display: none;
}

.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb > span
{
	display: block;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	word-wrap: normal;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	max-width: 100%;

	{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteSpan}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb > span,
	.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb a.crumb > span
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteSpanFirst}

		position: relative;
		max-width: none;
	}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIcon}">
	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb > span
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteSpanFirstHome}
	}
	</xen:if>

	.breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb > span
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbSpriteSpanLast}
	}

<xen:else />
.breadcrumb .crust
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbItemCrust}
}

.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb
{
	cursor: pointer;
	{xen:property breadcrumbItemCrumb}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb > span
	{
		display: block;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
		word-wrap: normal;
		white-space: nowrap;
		overflow: hidden;
		max-width: 100%;
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb,
	.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb a.crumb
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbItemFirstCrumb}
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n+1) a.crumb
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbItemOddCrumb}
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) a.crumb
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbItemEvenCrumb}
	}
	
	.breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbItemLastCrumb}
	}

	.breadcrumb .crumb:after 
	{
		content: '';
		bottom: 1px;
		display: block;
		position: absolute;
		right: -1px;
		top: 1px;
		width: 1px;
		background: inherit;
		z-index: 49;
	}

.breadcrumb .crust .arrow
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbItemArrowOuter}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child .arrow,
	.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb .arrow
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemFirstCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemFirstCrumb.background-color};
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n+1) .arrow
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemOddCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemOddCrumb.background-color};
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) .arrow
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemEvenCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemEvenCrumb.background-color};
	}

.breadcrumb .crust .arrow span
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbItemArrowInner}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust:first-child .arrow span,
	.breadcrumb .crust.firstVisibleCrumb .arrow span
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemFirstCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemFirstCrumb.background-color};
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n+1) .arrow span
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemOddCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemOddCrumb.background-color};
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:nth-child(2n) .arrow span
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemEvenCrumb.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemEvenCrumb.background-color};
	}

.breadcrumb .crust:hover a.crumb
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbItemCrumbHover}
}

	.breadcrumb .crust:hover .arrow
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemCrumbHover.background-color};
		-moz-border-right-colors: {xen:property breadcrumbItemCrumbHover.background-color};
	}

	.breadcrumb .crust:hover .arrow span
	{
		border-left-color: {xen:property breadcrumbItemCrumbHover.background-color};
	}

.breadcrumb .crust .arrow
{
	/* hide from IE6 */
	_display: none;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIcon}">
.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb span
{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIconNoText}">
	width: 0;
	text-indent: 9999px;
		<xen:if is="{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
		display: block;
		white-space: nowrap;
		</xen:if>
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableBreadcrumbSprites} && !{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
	margin-left: 6px;
	<xen:else />
	margin-left: 16px;
	</xen:if>

	{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIconLayoutSpan}
}
.breadcrumb .crust:first-child a.crumb span:before
{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIconFA}">
	content: '\f015';
	font-family: 'FontAwesome';
	font-size: 15px;
	<xen:else />
	content: '\e021';
	font-family: 'Glyphicons Regular', 'Glyphicons';
	font-size: 11px;
	</xen:if>

	left: -16px;

	{xen:property breadCrumbHomeIconLayout}

	color: inherit;
}
</xen:if>

.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger
{
	outline-style: none;

	{xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTrigger}
	<xen:if is="!{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
	{xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerContainer}
	</xen:if>
}

	.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger:after
	{
		<xen:if is="!{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
		margin-top: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerContainer.padding-top}) + intval({xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerContainer.border-top-width})'}px;
		</xen:if>
		{xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerFont}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
		{xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerFontSimple}
		</xen:if>
	}

		.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger.sidebarToggle:after,
		.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger.sidebarToggle.leftSidebar.toggled:after
		{
			<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
			content: '\f191';
			<xen:else />
			content: '\f152';
			</xen:if>
		}

		.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger.sidebarToggle.toggled:after,
		.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger.sidebarToggle.leftSidebar:after
		{
			<xen:if is="!{$pageIsRtl}">
			content: '\f191';
			<xen:else />
			content: '\f152';
			</xen:if>
		}

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property simpleBreadCrumb}">
	.breadcrumb .jumpMenuTrigger:hover
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumbJumpMenuTriggerContainerHover}
	}
	</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth})
{
	.Responsive .breadBoxTop.withTopCtrl
	{
		display: table;
		table-layout: fixed;
		width: 100%;
	}

	.Responsive .breadBoxTop.withTopCtrl nav
	{
		display: table-header-group;
	}

	.Responsive .breadBoxTop.withTopCtrl .topCtrl
	{
		display: table-footer-group;
		margin-top: 5px;
		text-align: right;
	}
}
</xen:if>

<xen:edithint template="message_user_info.css" />

<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitFirstOnly}"><xen:set var="$vbSuffix">.horizontal:first-child</xen:set><xen:else /><xen:set var="$vbSuffix">.horizontal</xen:set></xen:if>

.messageList
{
	{xen:property messageList}
}

.messageList .message
{
	position: relative;

	{xen:property message}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
	{xen:property primaryContent}

	{xen:property messageWrapper}
	</xen:if>
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
	.messageList .message{$vbSuffix}
	{
		{xen:property primaryContent}

		{xen:property messageWrapper}
	}
	</xen:if>

{xen:helper clearfix, '.messageList .message'}

<xen:if is="!{xen:property messageWrapped} && {xen:property showMessageSeparator}">
.message .messageSeparator
{
	{xen:property messageSeparator}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property showMessageSeparatorMobile}">
	display: none;
	</xen:if>
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped}">
	.messageList .message{$vbSuffix} .messageSeparator,
	</xen:if>
	.message:first-child .messageSeparator
	{
		display: none !important;
	}
</xen:if>


/*** Message block ***/

.message .messageInfo
{
	{xen:property messageInfo}

	margin-left: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageInfo.margin-left}) + {xen:property messageAvatarSize} - 96'}px;

	<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
	{xen:property messageInfoWrapped}
	</xen:if>

	zoom: 1;
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
	.message{$vbSuffix} .messageInfo
	{
		margin-left: 0;
		margin-right: 0;

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
		{xen:property messageInfoWrapped}
		</xen:if>
	}
	</xen:if>


	.message .newIndicator
	{
		display: block;
		position: absolute;
		margin: 0;
		right: -5px;
		top: -5px;

		{xen:property messageNewIndicator}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
		{xen:property messageNewIndicatorWrapped}
		</xen:if>
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
		.message{$vbSuffix} .newIndicator
		{
			{xen:property horizontalMessageNewIndicator}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped} || {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped}">
			{xen:property horizontalMessageNewIndicatorWrapped}
			</xen:if>
		}
		</xen:if>
	
		.message .newIndicator span
		{
			{xen:property messageNewIndicatorInner}
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .newIndicator span
			{
				{xen:property horizontalMessageNewIndicatorInner}
			}
			</xen:if>

	.message .messageContent
	{
		{xen:property messageContent}
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
		.message{$vbSuffix} .messageContent
		{
			{xen:property horizontalMessageContent}
		}
		</xen:if>
	
	.message .messageTextEndMarker
	{
		height: 0;
		font-size: 0;
		overflow: hidden;
	}
	
	.message .editDate
	{
		text-align: right;
		margin-top: 5px;
		font-size: 11px;
		color: {xen:property mutedTextColor};
	}

	.message .signature
	{
		position: relative;
		{xen:property messageSignature}
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property messageSignature.border-top-color} == {xen:property innerBottomBorder}">
		.message .signature:after
		{
			content: '';
			position: absolute;
			left: 0;
			right: 0;
			top: 0;
			border-top-width: {xen:property messageSignature.border-top-width};
			border-top-style: {xen:property messageSignature.border-top-style};
			border-top-color: {xen:property innerTopBorder};
		}
		</xen:if>

	.message .messageMeta
	{
		{xen:property messageMeta}
	}

		.message .privateControls
		{
			{xen:property messagePrivateControls}
		}

		.message .publicControls
		{
			{xen:property messagePublicControls}
		}
		
			.message .privateControls .item
			{
				margin-right: 10px;
				float: left;
			}

				.message .privateControls .item:last-child
				{
					margin-right: 0;
				}

			.message .publicControls .item
			{
				margin-left: 10px;
				float: left;
			}
	
				.message .messageMeta .control
				{
					{xen:property messageMetaControl}
				}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:focus
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlFocus}
					}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:hover
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlHover}
					}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:active
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlActive}
					}
	/*** multiquote +/- ***/
			
	.message .publicControls .MultiQuoteControl
	{
		{xen:property multiQuoteControl}
	}
	
	
	.message .publicControls .MultiQuoteControl.active
	{
		{xen:property multiQuoteControlActive}
	}
	
	<xen:include template="message_notices.css" />
	
	.message .likesSummary
	{
		box-shadow: none;

		{xen:property messageLikesSummary}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property showLikesGlyph}">
		position: relative;
		padding-left: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageLikesSummary.padding-left}) + 18'}px;
		</xen:if>
	}

		.message .likesSummary:after
		{
			{xen:property messageLikesSummaryGlyph}
		}
	
	.message .messageText > *:first-child
	{
		margin-top: 0;
	}

/* inline moderation changes */

<xen:if is="!{xen:property messageWrapped}">
.InlineModChecked .messageInfo,
	<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped}">
	.messageList .message.InlineModChecked{$vbSuffix},
	</xen:if>
<xen:else />
.messageList .message.InlineModChecked,
</xen:if>

{

}

.InlineModChecked .messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo

}

/* message list */

.messageList .message.placeholder
{
}

.messageList .placeholder .placeholderContent
{

	.messageList .placeholder a.avatar

		{
			display: block;

			height: 32px;
		}
		
	.messageList .placeholder .privateControls
	{
		margin-top: -5px;

/* messages remaining link */

.postsRemaining a,
a.postsRemaining
{
	font-size: 11px;

}

<xen:if is="{xen:property showMessageButtonGlyphs}">

</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{

{

	{
		margin-left: 0;
	}

	.Responsive .message .messageContent
	{
		min-height: 0;
	}

	{
	}

	.Responsive .message .authorEnd
	{
		display: none;

	{
		display: none;

	{

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped}">

<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitFirstOnly}"><xen:set var="$vbSuffix">.horizontal:first-child</xen:set><xen:else /><xen:set var="$vbSuffix">.horizontal</xen:set></xen:if>

.messageUserInfo
{
	{xen:property messageUserInfo}

	width: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageUserInfo.width}) + {xen:property messageAvatarSize} - 96'}px;
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
	.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserInfo
	{
		float: none;
		width: auto; 
	}
	</xen:if>

	.messageUserBlock
	{
		{xen:property messageUserBlock}
		<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
		background-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
		border-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
		{xen:property messageUserBlockWrapped}
		</xen:if>

		position: relative;
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
		.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock
		{
			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
			background-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
			border-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
			{xen:property messageUserBlockWrapped}
			</xen:if>

			{xen:property horizontalMessageUserBlock}
		}
		</xen:if>


		.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder
		{
			<xen:if is="{xen:property avatar.border-radius} == '50%'">
			border-radius: 50%;
			<xen:else />
			border-radius: 2px;
			</xen:if>
			{xen:property messageAvatarHolder}

			position: relative;	
		}

			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar img
			{
				width: {xen:property messageAvatarSize} !important;
				height: {xen:if '{xen:property messageAvatarSize} > 96', 'auto', '{xen:property messageAvatarSize}'} !important;

				<xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">
				border-radius: 50%;
				border-width: {xen:property avatar.border-width};
				</xen:if>
			}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder
			{
				{xen:property horizontalMessageAvatarHolder}
			}
			</xen:if>

			.quickReply .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder
			{
				margin-bottom: {xen:property messageAvatarHolder.margin-top};
			}
		
			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar
			{
				{xen:property messageAvatarHolderAvatar}
			}

				<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
				.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar img
				{
					width: {xen:property horizontalMessageAvatarSize} !important;
					height: {xen:if '{xen:property messageAvatarSize} > 96', 'auto', '{xen:property horizontalMessageAvatarSize}'} !important;
				}
				</xen:if>
			
			<xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicator}">
			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker
			{
				position: absolute;

				<xen:set var="$indicatorMarginLeft"><xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">10<xen:else />-5</xen:if></xen:set>
				<xen:set var="$indicatorMarginTop"><xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">10<xen:else />-3</xen:if></xen:set>
				<xen:set var="$indicatorLeft"><xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 1 || {xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 2">right<xen:else />left</xen:if></xen:set>
				<xen:set var="$indicatorTop"><xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 2 || {xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 3">bottom<xen:else />top</xen:if></xen:set>

				{$indicatorTop}: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-top}) - 1 + {$indicatorMarginTop}'}px;
				{$indicatorLeft}: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-left}) - 1 + {$indicatorMarginLeft}'}px;

				width: 16px;
				height: 16px;
				background: {xen:property blocksInnerBackground};
				border: none;
				border-radius: 50%;
			}

			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker:before
			{
				content: '';
				position: absolute;
				width: 10px;
				height: 10px;
				margin: 3px;
				background: {xen:property messageOnlineMarker.border-top-color};
				border-color: {xen:property messageOnlineMarker.border-top-color};
				border-radius: 50%;
			}

			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker:after
			{
				content: '';
				position: absolute;
				width: 32px;
				height: 32px;
				margin: -9px 0 0 -9px;
				border: 1px solid {xen:property messageOnlineMarker.border-top-color};
				border-radius: 50%;
				box-shadow: 0 0 4px {xen:property messageOnlineMarker.border-top-color}, inset 0 0 4px {xen:property messageOnlineMarker.border-top-color};
				-webkit-transform: scale(0);
				transform: scale(0);
				-webkit-animation: online 2.5s ease-in-out infinite;
				animation: online 2.5s ease-in-out infinite
			}

			@-webkit-keyframes online
			{
				0% {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: scale(0)}
				50% {opacity: .7}
				100% {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: scale(1)}
			}

			@keyframes online
			{
				0% {opacity: 1;transform: scale(0)}
				50% {opacity: .7}
				100% {opacity: 0;transform: scale(1)}
			}

			<xen:else />

			.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker
			{
				position: absolute;
				top: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-top}) - 1'}px;
				left: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-right}) - 1'}px;

				{xen:property messageOnlineMarker}

				<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
				{xen:property messageOnlineMarkerWrapped}
				</xen:if>
			}

				<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
				.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker
				{
					<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
					{xen:property messageOnlineMarkerWrapped}
					</xen:if>

					{xen:property horizontalMessageOnlineMarker}
				}
				</xen:if>
			</xen:if>
			
		.messageUserBlock h3.userText
		{
			{xen:property messageUserText}
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock h3.userText
			{
				{xen:property horizontalMessageUserText}
			}
			</xen:if>

		.messageUserBlock .userBanner
		{
			display: block;
			margin-bottom: 5px;
			margin-left: -{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageUserText.padding-left}) + 6'}px;
			margin-right: -{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageUserText.padding-right}) + 6'}px;
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock .userBanner
			{
				{xen:property horizontalMessageUserBanner}
			}
			</xen:if>

		.messageUserBlock .userBanner:last-child
		{
			margin-bottom: 0;
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock .userBanner span
			{
				display: none;
			}
			</xen:if>

		.messageUserBlock a.username
		{
			{xen:property messageUsername}
			
		}
		
		.messageUserBlock .userTitle
		{
			{xen:property messageUserTitle}
		}
		
		.messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo
		{
			{xen:property messageExtraUserInfo}
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo
			{
				{xen:property horizontalMessageExtraUserInfo}
			}
			</xen:if>
		
			.messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo dl
			{
				margin: 2px 0 0;
			}
							
			.messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo img
			{
				max-width: 100%;
			}
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property userProfileArrow}">
		<xen:if is="{xen:property useArrowSprite}">
		.messageUserBlock .arrow
		{
			background: transparent url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/arrows{xen:if '{xen:property messageWrapped}', '-wrapped'}-hd.png') 0 0 no-repeat;
			<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
			background-position: 100% 0;
			</xen:if>

			{xen:property arrowSprite}
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock .arrow,
			</xen:if>
			.messageUserBlock .arrow span
			{
				display: none;
			}
		<xen:else />
		.messageUserBlock .arrow
		{
			position: absolute;
			top: 10px;
			right: -10px;
			
			display: block;
			width: 0px;
			height: 0px;
			line-height: 0px;
			
			border: 10px solid transparent;
			<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
			border-left-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
			-moz-border-left-colors: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
			<xen:else />
			border-left-color: {xen:property messageUserBlock.border-color};
			-moz-border-left-colors: {xen:property messageUserBlock.border-color};
			</xen:if>
			border-right: none;

			
			/* Hide from IE6 */
			_display: none;
		}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit} && {xen:property vbPostbitWrapped} && !{xen:property messageWrapped}">
			.message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock .arrow
			{
				display: none;
			}
			</xen:if>
		
			.messageUserBlock .arrow span
			{
				position: absolute;
				top: -10px;
				left: -11px;
				
				display: block;
				width: 0px;
				height: 0px;
				line-height: 0px;
				
				border: 10px solid transparent;
				<xen:if is="{xen:property messageWrapped}">
				border-left-color: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
				-moz-border-left-colors: {xen:property wrappedProfileBG};
				<xen:else />
				border-left-color: {xen:property messageAvatarHolder.background-color};
				-moz-border-left-colors: {xen:property messageAvatarHolder.background-color};
				</xen:if>
				border-right: none;
			}
		</xen:if>
		<xen:else />
		.messageUserBlock .arrow
		{
			display: none;
		}		
		</xen:if>

/* Arrow */
<xen:if is="!{xen:property messageWrapped} && {xen:property displayMobileArrow} && {xen:property vbPostbit} && !{xen:property vbPostbitWrapped}">

			height: {xen:if '{xen:property messageAvatarSize} > 96', 'auto', '{xen:property responsiveMessageAvatarSize}'} !important;

		<xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicator}">

		{

			<xen:set var="$indicatorMarginTop"><xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">5<xen:else />-2</xen:if></xen:set>
			<xen:set var="$indicatorLeft"><xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 1 || {xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 2">right<xen:else />left</xen:if></xen:set>
			<xen:set var="$indicatorTop"><xen:if is="{xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 2 || {xen:property animatedOnlineIndicatorPosition} == 3">bottom<xen:else />top</xen:if></xen:set>

			{$indicatorTop}: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-top}) - 1 + {$indicatorMarginTop}'}px;
			{$indicatorLeft}: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property messageAvatarHolder.padding-left}) - 1 + {$indicatorMarginLeft}'}px;
		}
		<xen:else />

		{
			top: 4px;
			left: 4px;
			border-width: 6px;
		}
		</xen:if>

	.Responsive .messageUserBlock h3.userText
	{
		margin-left: {xen:calc '64 + {xen:property responsiveMessageAvatarSize} - 48'}px;
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property vbPostbit}">
		.Responsive .message{$vbSuffix} .messageUserBlock h3.userText
		{
			float: none;

	{

		.Responsive .messageUserBlock .userBanner span
		{

	.Responsive .messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo
	{
		display: none;
	}

	.Responsive .messageUserBlock .arrow
	{
		display: none;
	}


	<xen:if is="!{xen:property messageWrapped} && ({xen:property displayMobileArrow} && !{xen:property vbPostbit})">
	.Responsive .messageUserInfo
	{
		position: relative;
	}

	.Responsive .messageUserInfo:after
	{
		<xen:if is="{xen:property useArrowSprite}">
		content: '';
		display: block;
		background: transparent url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/arrows{xen:if '{xen:property messageWrapped}', '-wrapped'}-hd.png') right bottom no-repeat;
		<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
		background-position: left bottom;
		</xen:if>;

		{xen:property arrowSpriteDown}

		{xen:property arrowSpriteDownResponsive}
		<xen:else />
		{xen:property mobileMessageArrow}
		</xen:if>
	}
	</xen:if>
}
</xen:if>

<xen:set var="$altHeaderNavigation">0</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader} && {xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperHeader} && !({xen:property globalWrapperNavigation} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation})">
	<xen:set var="$altHeaderNavigation">1</xen:set>
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="!{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && !{xen:property enableTabbedNavigation} && {xen:property fullWidthNavigation}">
.navigationWrapper
{
	position: relative;
}

	.primaryNavigationWrapper
	{
		position: absolute;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		box-sizing: border-box;

		{xen:property navTabs}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperHeader} && !({xen:property globalWrapperNavigation} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation})">
		{xen:property navTabsNotWrapped}
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabs}
		</xen:if>
		
		border-radius: 0;
	}

		.primaryNavigationWrapper .navTabs
		{
			background: none;
			box-shadow: none;
			border-color: transparent;
			border-radius: 0;
			filter: none;
		}

	.secondaryNavigationWrapper
	{
		position: absolute;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
		bottom: 0;
		height: {xen:property headerTabHeight2};
		box-sizing: border-box;
	}
</xen:if>

#navigation
{
	position: relative;
}

#navigation .pageContent
{
	_height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property headerTabHeight2}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
	position: relative;

	{xen:property navigationPageContent}
}

	#navigation.split .pageContent
	{
		height: auto;
	}

#navigation .menuIcon
{
	position: relative;
	width: {xen:property navMenuIcon.width};
	display: inline-block;
	text-indent: -9999px;
}

#navigation .PopupOpen .menuIcon:before,
#navigation .navLink .menuIcon:before
{
	zoom: 1;
}

#navigation .menuIcon:before
{
	text-indent: 0;
	font-family: 'FontAwesome';
	content: '\f0c9';
	position: absolute;

	{xen:property navMenuIcon}
}

	#navigation .menuIcon:before
	{
		margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property headerTabHeight} - 33) / 2'}px;
	}
	
	.navTabs
	{
		{xen:property navTabs}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperHeader} && !({xen:property globalWrapperNavigation} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation})">
		{xen:property navTabsNotWrapped}
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabs}
		</xen:if>
		
		height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
	}

		.secondaryNavLinks .navTabs
		{
			background: transparent;
			border-width: 0;
			border-radius: 0;
			box-shadow: none;
		}
	
		.navTabs .publicTabs
		{
			float: left;
		}
		
		.navTabs .visitorTabs
		{
			float: right;
		}

			.navTabs .navTab
			{
				float: left;
				white-space: nowrap;
				word-wrap: normal;
				
				<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">*display: inline; *float: none; *zoom: 1;</xen:if>
			}

			<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} || {xen:property enableTabbedNavigation} || !{xen:property fullWidthNavigation}">
			.navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child,
			.navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child .navLink,
			.navTabs .publicTabs .navTab.firstVisible,
			.navTabs .publicTabs .navTab.firstVisible .navLink
			{
				{xen:property firstPublicNavTab}

				<xen:if is="!{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && {xen:property fullWidthNavigation}">
				border-radius: 0;
				</xen:if>
			}

			.navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child,
			.navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child .navLink,
			.navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.lastVisible,
			.navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.lastVisible .navLink
			{
				{xen:property lastVisitorNavTab}

				<xen:if is="!{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && {xen:property fullWidthNavigation}">
				border-radius: 0;
				</xen:if>
			}
			</xen:if>


/* ---------------------------------------- */
/* Links Inside Tabs */

.navTabs .navLink,
.navTabs .SplitCtrl
{
	font-family: {xen:property navFont};
	{xen:property navLink}
	
	<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">*float: none; *display: inline; *zoom: 1;</xen:if>
	
	height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
	line-height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
}

	.navTabs .publicTabs .navLink
	{
		{xen:property navLinkPublic}
	}

	.navTabs .visitorTabs .navLink
	{
		{xen:property navLinkVisitor}
	}

	.navTabs .has-icon.icon-hide-text .navLink
	{
		{xen:property tabLinkWithGlyph}
	}

	.visitorTabs .has-icon.icon-hide-text .navLink
	{
		{xen:property visitorTabLinkWithGlyph}
	}

	.navTabs .has-icon.icon-show-text .navLink
	{
		{xen:property tabLinkWithGlyphText}
	}

	.visitorTabs .has-icon.icon-show-text .navLink
	{
		{xen:property visitorTabLinkWithGlyphText}
	}

	.navTabs .navLink:hover
	{
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	/* ---------------------------------------- */
	/* unselected tab, popup closed */

	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed
	{
		position: relative;
	}

	.navTabs .navTab,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed
	{
		{xen:property navTabClosedLink}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabClosedLink}
		</xen:if>
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab .navLink,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink
	{
		color: {xen:property navTabClosedLink.color};

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		color: {xen:property altHeaderNavTabClosedLink.color};
		</xen:if>
	}
	
		.navTabs .navTab:hover,
		.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover
		{
			{xen:property navTabClosedLinkHover}

			<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
			{xen:property altHeaderNavTabClosedLinkHover}
			</xen:if>
		}

			.navTabs .navTab:hover .navLink,
			.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .navLink
			{
				color: {xen:property navTabClosedLinkHover.color};

				<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
				color: {xen:property altHeaderNavTabClosedLinkHover.color};
				</xen:if>
			}

	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .SplitCtrl,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .SplitCtrl
	{
		{xen:property navigationArrowContainer}
	color: inherit;
	}

		.Touch .navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .SplitCtrl,
		.Touch .navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .SplitCtrl
		{
			opacity: 1;
		}

		.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .SplitCtrl:after,
		.navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .SplitCtrl:after
		{
			{xen:property navigationArrow}
			color: inherit;
		}
		
		.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .SplitCtrl,
		.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed.icon-hide-text .SplitCtrl
		{
			opacity: 1;
		}
	
	/* ---------------------------------------- */
	/* selected tab */

	.navTabs .navTab.selected
	{
		{xen:property navTabSelected}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabSelected}
		</xen:if>
	}

		.navTabs .navTab.selected.empty,
		.navTabs .navTab.selected + .navTab.selected,
		.navTabs .navTab.navigationHiddenTabs + .selected:last-child
		{
			background: none !important;
			border-width: 0 !important;
			box-shadow: none !important;
			margin: 0 !important;
			margin: 0 !important;
		}

		.secondaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected
		{
			border-width: 0;
			border-radius: 0;
			box-shadow: none;
			background: transparent none;
			filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled = false);
		}

		.navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink
		{
			position: relative;
			color: {xen:property navTabSelected.color};

			<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
			color: {xen:property altHeaderNavTabSelected.color};
			</xen:if>
		}
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .SplitCtrl
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	/* ---------------------------------------- */
	/* unselected tab, popup open */

	.navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen
	{
		{xen:property navTabPopupOpen}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabPopupOpen}
		</xen:if>
	}

		.navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .navLink
		{
			color: {xen:property navTabPopupOpen.color};

			<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
			color: {xen:property altHeaderNavTabPopupOpen.color};
			</xen:if>
		}
	
	
	/* ---------------------------------------- */
	/* selected tab, popup open (account) */
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected.PopupOpen .navLink
	{
		{xen:property popupControl}

		{xen:property navTabPopupOpenLink}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabPopupOpenLink}
		</xen:if>
	}

/* Glyphs */
.Menu .navLink span.icon
{
	display: none;
}

.navLink span.icon,
.navLink span.icon:before 
{
	display: inline-block;
	color: inherit;
	font-size: inherit;
	line-height: 1em;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	position: relative;
	vertical-align: baseline;
}

	.navLink span.icon.fa
	{
	}

	.navLink span.icon.glyphicons
	{
		top: 2px;
	}

.navTab .navLink span.icon-text
{
	display: inline-block;
	line-height: 1em;
	padding-left: 5px;
}

.navTab.icon-hide-text .navLink span.icon-text
{
	display: none;
}

/* ---------------------------------------- */
/* Second Row */

.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
{
	position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	top: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
	height: {xen:property headerTabHeight2};
	{xen:property navTabSelectedRow}

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && {xen:property enableTabbedNavigation}">
	z-index: 3;
	</xen:if>

	*clear:expression(style.width = document.getElementById('navigation').offsetWidth + 'px', style.clear = "none", 0);
}

	.secondaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
	{
		position: relative;
		top: 0;
	}

	.navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList
	{
		{xen:property navTabSelectedRowLink}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderNavTabSelectedRowLink}
		</xen:if>
	}

	.withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList
	{
		<xen:if is="{xen:property searchBarCollapse} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation}">
		margin-right: 30px;
		<xen:else />
		margin-right: 275px;
		</xen:if>
	}

	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .menuHeader
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li
	{
		float: left;
		padding: 2px 0;
	}
	
		.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a
		{
			line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight2}) - 6'}px;
			font-family: {xen:property navFont};
			white-space: nowrap;

			{xen:property navTabLink}

			<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
			{xen:property altHeaderNavTabLink}
			</xen:if>
		}
		
		.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .PopupOpen a
		{
			color: inherit;
			text-shadow: none;
		}
		
			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus
			{
				{xen:property navTabLinkHover}

				<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
				{xen:property altHeaderNavTabLinkHover}
				</xen:if>
			}
			
			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:hover,
			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:focus
			{
				color: inherit;
				background: none;
				border-color: transparent;
				border-radius: 0;
				text-shadow: none;
			}

			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a .postItemCount,
			.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a .itemCount
			{
				color: {xen:property mutedTextColor};
				background-color: {xen:property blocksInnerBackground};

				box-shadow: none;
				float: none;
				margin-top: 2px;
				font-weight: bold;
				padding: 2px 4px;
				text-align: center;
			}

				.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a .postItemCount.alert,
				.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a .itemCount.alert
				{
					color: {xen:property alertBalloon.color};
					background-color: {xen:property alertBalloon.background-color};
				}
	
/* ---------------------------------------- */
/* Alert Balloons */
	
.navTabs .navLink .itemCount,
.altTabs .itemCount
{
	{xen:property alertBalloon}
}

	.navTabs .navLink .itemCount .arrow,
	.altTabs .itemCount .arrow
	{
		{xen:property alertBalloonArrow}
	}
	
.navTabs .navLink .itemCount.Zero,
.altTabs .itemCount.Zero
{
	display: none;
}

.navTabs .navLink .itemCount.ResponsiveOnly,
.altTabs .itemCount.ResponsiveOnly
{
	display: none !important;
}

.NoResponsive #VisitorExtraMenu_Counter,
.NoResponsive #VisitorExtraMenu_ConversationsCounter,
.NoResponsive #VisitorExtraMenu_AlertsCounter
{
	display: none !important;
}
	
/* ---------------------------------------- */
/* Account Popup Menu */

.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink
{
	font-weight: bold;
}

	.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink .accountUsername
	{
		display: block;
		max-width: 100px;
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
	}

#AccountMenu
{
	width: 274px;
}

#AccountMenu .menuHeader
{
	position: relative;
}

	#AccountMenu .menuHeader .avatar
	{
		float: left;
		margin-right: 10px;
	}

	#AccountMenu .menuHeader .visibilityForm
	{
		margin-top: 10px;
		color: {xen:property primaryMedium};
	}
	
	#AccountMenu .menuHeader .links .fl
	{
		position: absolute;
		bottom: 10px;
		left: {xen:calc '10 + 10 + 96'}px;
	}

	#AccountMenu .menuHeader .links .fr
	{
		position: absolute;
		bottom: 10px;
		right: 10px;
	}
	
#AccountMenu .menuColumns
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
	padding: 2px;
}

	#AccountMenu .menuColumns ul
	{
		float: left;
		padding: 0;
		max-height: none;
		overflow: hidden;
	}

		#AccountMenu .menuColumns a,
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns label
		{
			width: 115px;
		}

		/* Accounts menu */
		<xen:if is="{xen:property useGlyphsForAccounts}">
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link a,
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link label
		{
			width: 105px;
			padding-left: 20px;
		}

		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link { position: relative; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link:before
		{

			line-height: 16px;
			margin-top: -8px;
			color: {xen:property faintTextColor};
			text-align: left;
		}

		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link:hover:before
		{

		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-security:before,
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-conversations:before,
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-likes:before,

		{
			font-family: 'Glyphicons Regular', 'Glyphicons';
