		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-signature:before { content: '\f044'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-contact-details:before { content: '\f041'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-privacy:before { content: '\E053'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-preferences:before { content: '\E281'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-alert-preferences:before { content: '\f0f3'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-avatar:before { content: '\f03e'; font-size: .9em; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-external-accounts:before { content: '\f08e'; font-size: .9em; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-security:before { content: '\E271'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-news-feed:before { content: '\f09e'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-conversations:before { content: '\E130'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-alerts:before { content: '\f0f3'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-likes:before { content: '\E344'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-search-member:before { content: '\E028'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-following:before { content: '\E432'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-ignored:before { content: '\f235'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-upgrades:before { content: '\f234'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-logout:before { content: '\f08b'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-two-step:before { content: '\f023'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-ratings-received:before { content: '\f087'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-ratings-given:before { content: '\f123'; }
		#AccountMenu .menuColumns li.with-link.link-account-about-author:before { content: '\f0f6'; }

		</xen:if>


#AccountMenu .statusPoster textarea
{
	width: 245px;
	margin: 0;
	resize: vertical;
	overflow: hidden;
}

#AccountMenu .statusPoster .submitUnit
{
	margin-top: 5px;
	text-align: right;
}

	#AccountMenu .statusPoster .submitUnit .statusEditorCounter
	{
		float: left;
		line-height: 23px;
		height: 23px;
	}
	
/* ---------------------------------------- */
/* Inbox, Alerts Popups */

.navPopup
{
	width: 260px;
}

.navPopup a:hover,
.navPopup .listItemText a:hover
{
	background: none;
	text-decoration: underline;
}

	.navPopup .menuHeader .InProgress
	{
		float: right;
		display: block;
		width: 20px;
		height: 20px;
	}

.navPopup .listPlaceholder
{
	max-height: 350px;
	overflow: auto;
}

	.navPopup .listPlaceholder ol.secondaryContent
	{
		padding: 0 10px;
	}

		.navPopup .listPlaceholder ol.secondaryContent.Unread
		{
			border-left: 5px solid {xen:property inlineModChecked.background-color};
			border-right: 5px solid {xen:property inlineModChecked.background-color};
			padding: 0 5px;
		}

.navPopup .listItem
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
	padding: 5px 0;
	border-top: 1px solid {xen:property innerTopBorder};
	border-bottom: 1px solid {xen:property innerBottomBorder};
}

	.navPopup .listItem:first-child
	{
		border-top-width: 0;
	}

	.navPopup .listItem:last-child
	{
		border-bottom-width: 0;
	}

.navPopup .PopupItemLinkActive:hover
{
	margin: 0 -8px;
	padding: 5px 8px;
	border-radius: 0;
	cursor: pointer;
}

.navPopup .avatar
{
	float: left;
}

	.navPopup .avatar img
	{
		width: 32px;
		height: 32px;
	}

.navPopup .listItemText
{
	margin-left: 37px;
}

	.navPopup .listItemText .muted
	{
		font-size: 9px;
	}

	.navPopup .unread .listItemText .title,
	.navPopup .listItemText .subject
	{
		font-weight: bold;
	}

		.navPopup .unread .listItemText .title a,
		.navPopup .Unread .listItemText .title a
		{
			color: {xen:property secondaryMedium};
		}

.navPopup .sectionFooter .floatLink
{
	float: right;
}

/* Tabbed navigation */
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableTabbedNavigation} && !{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation}">

<xen:set var="$layout">0</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperHeader} && !({xen:property globalWrapperNavigation} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation})">
	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader}">
		<xen:set var="$layout">2</xen:set>
	<xen:else />
		<xen:set var="$layout">1</xen:set>
	</xen:if>
</xen:if>

#navigation.notStatic
{
	margin-bottom: {xen:property tabbedNavMargin};
}

	#navigation.notStatic.withSearch
	{
		margin-bottom: 0;
	}

	#navigation.notStatic.withSearch + #searchBar
	{
		margin-bottom: {xen:property tabbedNavMargin};
	}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:before,
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:after
	{
		content: '';
		position: absolute;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		pointer-events: none;
		z-index: -1;
	}

		#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:before
		{
			top: 0;
			height: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight};
		}

		#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:after
		{
			top: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight};
			height: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight2};
		}
	</xen:if>

#navigation.notStatic .pageContent
{
	height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight}) + intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight2})'}px;
}

	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth > div
	{
		position: relative;
	}

#navigation.notStatic .menuIcon:before
{
	margin-top: {xen:calc '(intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight}) - 33) / 2'}px;
}

#navigation.notStatic .navTabs
{
	{xen:property tabbedNavTabsLayout}

	height: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight};
	background: transparent none;
	border-width: 0;
	border-radius: 0;
	box-shadow: none;

}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:before
	<xen:else />
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs
	</xen:if>
	{
		{xen:property tabbedNavTabsBackground}

		<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
		{xen:property tabbedNavTabsBackground1}
		<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
		{xen:property tabbedNavTabsBackground2}
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
		{xen:property tabbedNavTabsBackgroundFull}
		</xen:if>
	}


	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab
	{
		{xen:property tabbedNavTab}

		<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
		{xen:property tabbedNavTab1}
		<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
		{xen:property tabbedNavTab2}
		</xen:if>

		box-sizing: border-box;
	}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab:hover
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabHover}

			<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabHover1}
			<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabHover2}
			</xen:if>
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabSelected}

			<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabSelected1}
			<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabSelected2}
			</xen:if>
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabOpen}

			<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabOpen1}
			<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabOpen2}
			</xen:if>
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child .navLink,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab.firstVisible,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab.firstVisible .navLink
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabFirst}
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child .navLink,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.lastVisible,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.lastVisible .navLink
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLast}
		}

	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navLink,
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .SplitCtrl
	{
		color: inherit;

		{xen:property tabbedNavTabLink}

		height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight}) - intval({xen:property tabbedNavTab.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property tabbedNavTab.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight}) - intval({xen:property tabbedNavTab.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property tabbedNavTab.border-bottom-width})'}px;
	}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .publicTabs .navLink
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkPublic}
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navLink
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkVisitor}
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .SplitCtrl
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkSplitCtrl}
		}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink:after
		{
			content: '';
			pointer-events: none;

			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkSelectedAfter}

			<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkSelectedAfter1}
			<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
			{xen:property tabbedNavTabLinkSelectedAfter2}
			</xen:if>
		}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavMergeVisitorTabs}">
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs
	{
		{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabs}

		<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
		{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabs1}
		<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
		{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabs2}
		</xen:if>

		box-sizing: border-box;
	}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabsTab}
		}

			#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:hover
			{
				{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabsTabHover}
			}

			#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.selected
			{
				{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabsTabSelected}
			}

			#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.PopupOpen
			{
				{xen:property tabbedNavMergedVisitorTabsTabOpened}
			}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab.selected .navLink:after
		{
			display: none;
		}
	</xen:if>

#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
{
	background: transparent none;
	border-width: 0;
	border-radius: 0;
	box-shadow: none;

	top: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight};
	height: {xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight2};
	box-sizing: border-box;

	color: {xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks.color};
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:after
	<xen:else />
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
	</xen:if>
	{
		{xen:property primaryContent.border}

		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks}

		<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks1}
		<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks2}
		</xen:if>

		<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksFull}
		</xen:if>
	}

	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li
	{
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLinkContainer}
	}

	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a
	{
		line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tabbedNavigationHeight2}) - 4 - intval({xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinks.border-bottom-width})'}px;

		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLink}

		<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLink1}
		<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLink2}
		</xen:if>
	}

		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus
		{
			{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLinkHover}

			<xen:if is="{$layout} == 1">
			{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLinkHover1}
			<xen:elseif is="{$layout} == 2" />
			{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksLinkHover2}
			</xen:if>
		}

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:before
	<xen:else />
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs
	</xen:if>
	{
		{xen:property tabbedNavTabsBackgroundResponsive}
	}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth:after
	<xen:else />
	#navigation.notStatic .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
	</xen:if>
	{
		<xen:if is="{xen:property tabbedNavFullWidth}">
		{xen:property tabbedNavSelectedLinksResponsive}
		</xen:if>
	}
}
</xen:if>
</xen:if>

/* Static navigation */
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableStaticNavigation}">
#navigation.static
{
	{xen:property staticNavContainer}
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} || {xen:property enableTabbedNavigation} || !{xen:property fullWidthNavigation}">
	<xen:if is="{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property pageWidth.width})'} > 0 || {xen:property maxPageWidth}">
	#navigation.static .staticContent.pageWidth
	{
		max-width: {xen:if '{xen:property maxPageWidth}', '{xen:property maxPageWidth}', '{xen:property pageWidth.width}'};
		margin: 0 auto;
	}
	</xen:if>
	<xen:else />
	#navigation.static .staticContent.pageWidth
	{
		max-width: none;
		margin: 0 auto;
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
	}
	</xen:if>

	#navigation.static:hover,
	#navigation.static.hover
	{
		{xen:property staticNavContainerHover}
	}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property staticNavSecondRowVisible}">
		#navigation.static .withSecondaryLinks .navTabs
		<xen:else />
		#navigation.static:hover .withSecondaryLinks .navTabs,
		#navigation.static.hover .withSecondaryLinks .navTabs
		</xen:if>
		{
			height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property headerTabHeight2}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		}

	#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks .navTab.selected
	{
		float: none;
	}

		#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
		#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs
		{
			height: {xen:property headerTabHeight2};
		}

#navigation.static .pageContent
{
	{xen:property staticNavPageContent}
}

	#navigation.static:hover .pageContent,
	#navigation.static.hover .pageContent
	{
		{xen:property staticNavPageContentHover}
	}

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property staticNavSecondRowVisible}">
	#navigation.static .pageContent
	{
		height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
	}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
	#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks
	{
		display: none;
	}

		#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks
		{
			position: absolute;
			left: 0;
			right: 0;
			top: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		}

		<xen:if is="{xen:property staticNavSecondRowVisibleHover}">
		#navigation.static:hover .pageContent,
		#navigation.static.hover .pageContent
		{
			height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property headerTabHeight}) + intval({xen:property headerTabHeight2}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-top-width}) + intval({xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		}

		#navigation.static:hover .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
		#navigation.static.hover .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
		#navigation.static:hover .secondaryNavLinks,
		#navigation.static.hover .secondaryNavLinks
		{
			display: block;
		}
		</xen:if>
	</xen:if>

#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs
{
	{xen:property staticNavTabs}
}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child,
	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab:first-child .navLink
	{
		{xen:property staticNavLinkFirst}
	}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child,
	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .visitorTabs .navTab:last-child .navLink
	{
		{xen:property staticNavLinkLast}
	}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navLink,
	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .SplitCtrl
	{
		{xen:property staticNavLink}
	}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab,
	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed
	{
		{xen:property staticNavTabClosedLink}
	}
	
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab .navLink,
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink
		{
			color: {xen:property staticNavTabClosedLink.color};
		}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab:hover,
	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover
	{
		{xen:property staticNavTabClosedLinkHover}
	}
	
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab:hover .navLink,
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .navLink
		{
			color: {xen:property staticNavTabClosedLinkHover.color};
		}


#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink
{
	{xen:property staticNavTabSelected}
}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
	#navigation.static .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks,
	#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks
	{
		{xen:property staticNavTabSelectedRow}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHeaderStaticNavTabSelectedRow}
		</xen:if>
	}

		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList
		{
			{xen:property staticNavTabSelectedRowLink}
		}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a,
	#navigation.static .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a,
	#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks a
	{
		{xen:property staticNavTabLink}
	}
	
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus,
		#navigation.static .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.static .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus,
		#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks a:focus
		{
			{xen:property staticNavTabLinkHover}
		}

#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen
{
	{xen:property staticNavTabPopupOpen}
}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks .navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .navLink
	{
		color: {xen:property staticNavTabPopupOpen.color};
	}
</xen:if>

/* Alternative navigation */
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation}">
/* Hide old navigation */
#navigation.altNav .primaryNavLinks
{
	display: none;
}

	#navigation.static .primaryNavLinks
	{
		display: block;
	}

/* Secondary links row */
#navigation.altNav .pageContent
{
	{xen:property breadcrumbSimpleLayout}

	{xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer}
}

	.globalWrapper #navigation.altNav .pageContent
	{
		{xen:property altnavSecondaryContainerWrapped}
	}

#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs,
#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .navTab
{
	background: transparent;
	border-width: 0;
	border-radius: 0;
	box-shadow: none;
	height: auto;
	float: none;
	position: relative;
	top: 0;
	display: block;
}

	#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .userTabs .navTab
	{
		display: block;
		float: left;
	}

	#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .tabLinks
	{
		{xen:property altnavSecondaryLinks}
	}

	#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks
	{
		height: auto;
		float: left;
		width: auto;
	}

	#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li
	{
		height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;

		{xen:property altnavSecondaryLink}
	}

		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .PopupControl.PopupOpen, 
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen
		{
			background-color: transparent;
			background-image: none;
			border-width: 0;
			border-radius: 0;
		}

		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a,
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus,
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:hover, 
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:focus
		{
			line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;

			{xen:property altnavSecondaryLinkContent}
		}

		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover,
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus,
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:hover, 
		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .Popup a:focus
		{
			{xen:property altnavSecondaryLinkHover}
		}


		#navigation.altNav .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks .arrowWidget
		{
			{xen:property altnavSecondaryArrowWidget}
		}

	#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks
	{
		width: 100%;
		margin: 0;
		min-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;
	}

		#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs
		{
			vertical-align: middle;
			float: left;
		}

			#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs:after
			{
				content: '';
				display: block;
				clear: both;
			}

			#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs.userTabs
			{
				float: right;
				text-align: right;
			}

			#navigation.altNav.withSearch .secondaryNavLinks .navTabs.userTabs
			{
				padding-right: 30px !important;
			}

			#navigation.altNav.withSearch .withUserTabs .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList
			{
				margin-right: 0;
			}

		#navigation.altNav .secondaryNavLinks .visitorTabs
		{
			height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		}

	#navigation.altNav .userTabs .navTab .navLink, 
	#navigation.altNav .userTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink
	{
		color: {xen:property link.color};
		height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})'}px;
		text-shadow: none;
	}

		#navigation.altNav .userTabs .navTab:hover
		#navigation.altNav .userTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover
		{
			color: {xen:property linkHover.color};
			text-shadow: none;
		}

		#navigation.altNav .userTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .navLink
		{
			color: {xen:property linkHover.color};
			text-shadow: none;
		}

	#navigation.altNav #QuickSearchPlaceholder
	{
		top: -{xen:calc '(14.25 + intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryHeight}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-top-width}) - intval({xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.border-bottom-width})) / 2'}px;

		{xen:property altnavQuickSearchAdjustments}
	}

#navigation.static #searchBar,
#navigation.static .secondaryNavLinks .userTabs
{
	display: none !important;
}

/* Swap margin and padding for static content for sticky navigation */
#navigation.altNav .staticContent
{
	padding-bottom: {xen:property altnavSecondaryContainer.margin-bottom};
}

	.globalWrapper #navigation.altNav .staticContent
	{
		padding-bottom: 0;
	}

	#navigation.altNav .staticContent .pageContent
	{
		margin-bottom: 0;
	}

/* Primary links row */
.altTabs
{
	display: none;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property altNavAlwaysCentered} != 1">
	<xen:if is="{xen:property altNavAlwaysCentered} > 0">
		<xen:set var="$responsiveLogoWidth">{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altNavAlwaysCentered})'}</xen:set>
	<xen:else />
		<xen:set var="$responsiveLogoWidth">{xen:calc '{xen:property headerLogoWidth} + 150'}</xen:set>
	</xen:if>
	<xen:if is="{$responsiveLogoWidth} < {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})'}">
		<xen:set var="$responsiveLogoWidth">{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})'}</xen:set>
	</xen:if>
</xen:if>

<xen:set var="$altTabHeight">{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property altnavLink.padding-top}) + intval({xen:property altnavLink.padding-bottom}) + intval({xen:property altnavLink.height})'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$altTabMargin">{xen:calc '({xen:property headerLogoHeight} - {$altTabHeight}) / 2'}</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{$altTabMargin} < 5">
	<xen:set var="$altTabMargin">5</xen:set>
</xen:if>

<xen:set var="$altHeaderAltNavigation">0</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader} && {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation} && {xen:property globalWrapper} && !{xen:property globalWrapperHeader}">
	<xen:set var="$altHeaderAltNavigation">1</xen:set>
</xen:if>

.altNav .altTabs
{
	display: block;
	float: none;
	text-align: center;
	margin: 10px auto;
}

	.altNav .altTabs:after
	{
		content: '';
		display: block;
		clear: both;
	}

<xen:if is="{xen:property altNavAlwaysCentered} != 1">
@media (min-width: {$responsiveLogoWidth}px)
{
	.altNav .altTabs
	{
		display: block;
		float: right;
		text-align: right;
		margin-top: {$altTabMargin}px;
		<xen:if is="{xen:property altnavMargin} != ''">
		margin-top: {xen:property altnavMargin};
		</xen:if>
	}

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property showLoginInNavigation} && {xen:property altnavMargin} == '' && {$altTabMargin} > 10">
	.LoggedOut .altNav .altTabs
	{
		margin-top: {xen:calc '{$altTabMargin} + 10'}px;
	}
	</xen:if>
}
</xen:if>

.altNav .altTabsContainer
{
	{xen:property altnavTabs}
}

.altTabs .navTab,
.altTabs .navTab.PopupControl.PopupOpen
{
	vertical-align: top;
	position: relative;

	{xen:property altnavTabContainer}
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && ({xen:calc 'intval({xen:property pageWidth.width})'} > 0 || {xen:property maxPageWidth})">
	<xen:if is="{xen:property maxPageWidth}">
	@media (max-width:{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property maxPageWidth}) + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-left}) + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-right})'}px)
	<xen:else />
	@media (max-width:{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property pageWidth.width}) + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-left}) + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-right})'}px)
	</xen:if>
	{
		.altTabs .navTab.lastVisible,
		.altTabs .navTab.PopupControl.PopupOpen.lastVisible
		{
			margin-right: {xen:property altnavTabContainer.margin-left};
		}
	}
	</xen:if>

.altTabs .navLink
{
	position: relative;
	text-decoration: none !important;
	outline: none !important;

	{xen:property altnavLink}

	<xen:if is="{$altHeaderAltNavigation}">
	{xen:property altHNavLink}
	</xen:if>
}

	.altTabs .selected .navLink
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkSelected}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderAltNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHNavLinkSelected}
		</xen:if>
	}


	.altTabs .navLink:hover,
	.altTabs .navTab:hover .navLink
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkHover}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderAltNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHNavLinkHover}
		</xen:if>
	}

	.altTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .navLink
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkOpen}

		<xen:if is="{$altHeaderAltNavigation}">
		{xen:property altHNavLinkOpen}
		</xen:if>
	}

	.altTabs .navLink,
	.altTabs .navLink span.icon-text
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkText}
	}

	.altTabs .has-icon .navLink
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkIconFont}
	}

	.altTabs .navLink span.icon-text
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkTextExtra}
	}

	.altTabs .navLink .icon,
	.altTabs .navigationHiddenTabs .navLink:after
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkIconFont}

		{xen:property altnavLinkIcon}
	}

.altTabs .itemCount
{
	{xen:property altnavLinkAlert}
}

	.altTabs .itemCount .arrow
	{
		{xen:property altnavLinkAlertArrow}
	}

	.altTabs .navigationHiddenTabs .navLink:after
	{
		{xen:property altnavHiddenLink}
	}

		.altTabs .navigationHiddenTabs .navLink .menuIcon
		{
			display: none;
		}

	.altTabs .SplitCtrl
	{
		display: none;
	}

	.altTabs .PopupControl .SplitCtrl
	{
		{xen:property altnavSplitCtrl}
	}
</xen:if>

/* Static and alternative nav common elements */
<xen:if is="{xen:property enableStaticNavigation} || {xen:property enableAlternativeNavigation}">
#navigation.static .navTabs .navLink .itemCount,
.altnavUserNavigation .navTabs .navLink .itemCount
{
	{xen:property staticNavAlertBalloon}
}

	#navigation.static .navTabs .navLink .itemCount.Zero,
	.altnavUserNavigation .navTabs .navLink .itemCount.Zero
	{
		display: none;
	}

	#navigation.static .navTabs .navLink .itemCount .arrow,
	.altnavUserNavigation .navTabs .navLink .itemCount.Zero
	{
		{xen:property staticNavAlertBalloonArrow}
	}
</xen:if>

/* Floating quick navigation */
#floatingNavigation
{
	{xen:property floatingNavLayout}
	display: block;
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	right: 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

	#floatingNavigation.hidden
	{
		opacity: 0;
	}

	.Touch #floatingNavigation,
	#floatingNavigation:hover
	{
		opacity: 1;
	}

	#floatingNavigation a,
	#floatingNavigation a:hover
	{
		{xen:property floatingNavLink}
		color: inherit;
	}

		#floatingNavigation a:hover
		{
			{xen:property floatingNavLinkHover}
		}

		#floatingNavigation a:first-child
		{
			border-top-left-radius: {xen:property floatingNavLayout.border-radius};
			border-bottom-left-radius: {xen:property floatingNavLayout.border-radius};
		}

		#floatingNavigation a:last-child
		{
			border-top-right-radius: {xen:property floatingNavLayout.border-radius};
			border-bottom-right-radius: {xen:property floatingNavLayout.border-radius};
		}

		#floatingNavigation a:hover
		{
			/*background-color: {xen:property secondaryMedium};*/
		}

		#floatingNavigation a.floating-top,
		#floatingNavigation a.floating-bottom
		{
			text-indent: 9999px;
			overflow: hidden;
			position: relative;
			width: 7px;
			display: block;
			float: left;
		}

			#floatingNavigation a.floating-top:after,
			#floatingNavigation a.floating-bottom:after
			{
				content: '\f062';
				position: absolute;
				display: block;
				left: 0;
				right: 0;
				top: 0;
				bottom: 0;
				font-family: 'FontAwesome';
				text-align: center;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-style: normal;
				text-indent: 0;
				line-height: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property floatingNavLayout.font-size}) + intval({xen:property floatingNavLink.padding-top}) + intval({xen:property floatingNavLink.padding-bottom})'}px;
				opacity: .7;
				-webkit-transition: opacity .3s ease;
				transition: opacity .3s ease;
			}

			#floatingNavigation a.floating-bottom:after
			{
				content: '\f063';
			}

			#floatingNavigation a:hover:after
			{
				opacity: 1;
			}

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	.Responsive .navTabs
	{
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
		border-radius: 0;
	}

		.Responsive #navigation.altNav .navTabs
		{
			padding-left: 5px;
			padding-right: 5px;
		}

	.Responsive .withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList
	{
		margin-right: 30px;
	}

	.Responsive .navTabs .navTab,
	.Responsive .navTabs .navTab .navLink
	{
		border-radius: 0 !important;
	}
}
</xen:if>

<xen:include template="header.css" />

<xen:include template="footer.css" />

<xen:include template="breadcrumb.css" />

<xen:include template="navigation.css" />

<xen:include template="search_bar.css" />

/** move the header to the top again **/

#headerMover
{
	position: relative;
	zoom: 1;
}

/** Generic page containers **/
<xen:set var="$pageWidth"><xen:if is="{xen:property maxPageWidth}">{xen:property maxPageWidth}<xen:elseif is="{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property pageWidth.width})'}" />{xen:property pageWidth.width}<xen:else />0</xen:if></xen:set>

.pageWidth,
#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth > div,
.globalWrapper.pageWidth #navigation.static > .pageWidth
{
	{xen:property pageWidth}
	<xen:if is="{$pageWidth} > 0">
		width: auto;
		max-width: {xen:raw $pageWidth};
		margin-left: auto;
		margin-right: auto;
		_width: {xen:raw $pageWidth};
	</xen:if>
}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper}">
	.globalWrapper.pageWidth #navigation.static > .pageWidth,
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth > div,
	#navigation.static > .pageWidth
	{
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
	}
	</xen:if>

	.pageWidth .pageWidth,
	#navigation.notStatic.fullWidth,
	.pageWidth #navigation.notStatic.fullWidth > div,
	.globalWrapper.pageWidth #navigation.static > .pageWidth .pageWidth
	{
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		width: auto;
		max-width: none;
		min-width: 0;
		box-sizing: content-box;
		_width: auto;
	}

.NoResponsive body
{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property nonResponsiveMinWidth}">min-width: {xen:property nonResponsiveMinWidth};</xen:if>
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper}">
.globalWrapper
{
	{xen:property content.background}

	{xen:property globalWrapperLayout}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader}">
	{xen:property altGlobalWrapperLayout}
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapperHeader}">
	{xen:property globalWrapperHeaderStyle}
	<xen:elseif is="{xen:property globalWrapperNavigation}" />
	{xen:property globalWrapperNavigationStyle}
	<xen:else />
	{xen:property globalWrapperNoNavigationStyle}
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:calc 'intval({xen:property pageWidth.width})'} > 0 || {xen:property maxPageWidth}">
		margin-left: auto;
		margin-right: auto;
	</xen:if>
}

<xen:else />

#content .pageContent
{
	{xen:property content}
}
</xen:if>

{xen:helper clearfix, '#content .pageContent'}

<xen:include template="sidebar.css" />

/** Text used in message bodies **/

.messageText
{
	{xen:property messageText}
}

	.primaryContent .messageText.primaryContent
	{
		{xen:property messageTextWrapped}
	}

	.messageText img,
	.messageText iframe,
	.messageText object,
	.messageText embed
	{
		max-width: 100%;
	}

/** Link groups and pagenav container **/

.pageNavLinkGroup
{
	display: table;
	*zoom: 1;
	table-layout: fixed;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	
	{xen:property pageNavLinkGroup}
}

opera:-o-prefocus, .pageNavLinkGroup
{
	display: block;
	overflow: hidden;
}

	.pageNavLinkGroup:after
	{
		content: ". .";
		display: block;
		word-spacing: 99in;
		overflow: hidden;
		height: 0;
		font-size: 0.13em;
		line-height: 0;
	}

	.pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup
	{
		float: right;
	}

.linkGroup
{
}
	
	.linkGroup a
	{
		{xen:property linkGroupLink}
	}

		.linkGroup a.inline
		{
			padding: 0;
		}

	.linkGroup a,
	.linkGroup .Popup,
	.linkGroup .element
	{
		margin-left: {xen:property linkGroupLinkSpacing};
		display: block;
		float: left;
		<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">*display: inline; *float: none; *zoom: 1;</xen:if>
	}
	
		.linkGroup .Popup a
		{
			margin-left: -2px;
			margin-right: -5px;
			*margin-left: {xen:property linkGroupLinkSpacing};
			padding: {xen:property linkGroupLink.padding-top} 5px;
		}

	.linkGroup .element
	{
		padding: 3px 0;
	}

/** Call to action buttons **/

a.callToAction
{
	{xen:property callToAction}
	
}

	.topCtrl a.callToAction + a.callToAction
	{
		margin-left: 5px;
	}

	.breadBoxTop a.callToAction,
	.breadBoxBottom a.callToAction
	{
		{xen:property breadcrumCallToAction}
	}

	a.callToAction span
	{
		position: relative;
		{xen:property callToActionSpan}
	}

		.breadBoxTop a.callToAction span,
		.breadBoxBottom a.callToAction span
		{
			{xen:property breadcrumCallToActionSpan}
		}

	a.callToAction:hover
	{
		text-decoration: none;
	}

		a.callToAction:hover span
		{
			{xen:property callToActionHover}
		}

		a.callToAction:active
		{
			/*position: relative;
			top: 2px;*/
		}
		
		a.callToAction:active span
		{
			{xen:property callToActionActive}
		}

	a.callToAction span i.icon
	{
		display: inline-block;
	}

		a.callToAction span i.icon,
		a.callToAction span i.icon:before
		{
			color: inherit;
			font-size: inherit;
			font-weight: normal;
			font-style: normal;
			line-height: 1em;
			margin: 0;
			padding: 0;
			position: relative;
			vertical-align: baseline;
		}

		a.callToAction span i.icon
		{
			padding-right: 3px;
		}

			a.callToAction span i.icon.glyphicon
			{
				top: 2px;
			}

			a.callToAction span i.icon.fa
			{
				font-size: 1.1em;
			}

	.sidebarToggle .callToAction
	{
		text-align: center;
		display: block;
		margin: 5px auto 10px;
		max-width: 250px;
	}

			.sidebarToggle .callToAction span strong.arrow
			{
				display: inline-block;
				padding-left: 5px;
			}

				.sidebarToggle .callToAction span strong.arrow:after
				{
					content: '\f062';
					font-family: FontAwesome;
					font-weight: normal;
					font-style: normal;
					font-size: .9em;
				}

				.sidebarToggle .callToAction span strong.arrow.down:after
				{
					content: '\f063';
				}

/* Breadcrumb buttons copied to title */
<xen:if is="{xen:property moveBreadcrumbButton}">
.titleBar .titleBarButtons
{
	float: right;
}

	.titleBar .titleBarButtons a.callToAction
	{
		{xen:property titleBarCallToAction}

		margin-left: 10px;
	}

	.titleBar .titleBarButtons a.callToAction span
	{
		{xen:property titleBarCallToActionInner}
	}

	.titleBar .titleBarButtons a.callToAction:hover span
	{
		{xen:property titleBarCallToActionInnerHover}
	}
</xen:if>


/*********/

.avatarHeap
{
	zoom: 1;
}

	.avatarHeap ol
	{
		margin-right: -4px;
		margin-top: -4px;
	}

		.avatarHeap ol:before,
		.avatarHeap ol:after
		{
			content: ' ';
			display: table;
		}

			.avatarHeap ol:after
			{
				clear: both;
			}
	
		.avatarHeap li
		{
			float: left;
			margin-right: 4px;
			margin-top: 4px;
		}
		
		.avatarHeap li .avatar
		{
			display: block;
		}

.fbWidgetBlock .fb_iframe_widget,
.fbWidgetBlock .fb_iframe_widget > span,
.fbWidgetBlock .fb_iframe_widget iframe
{
	width: 100% !important;
}

.tagBlock
{
	margin: 10px 0;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.tagList,
.tagList li
{
	display: inline;
}


.tagList .tag
{
	position: relative;
	display: inline-block;
	<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
	background: url("{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/tags-rtl.png") 0 0 repeat-x;
	<xen:else />
	background: url("{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/tags.png") 0 0 repeat-x;
	</xen:if>
	background-size: 15px 200px;
	margin-left: 15px;
	margin-right: 6px;
	height: 18px;
	line-height: 18px;
	padding: 0;
	padding-left: 3px;
	border-width: 0;
	margin-bottom: 2px;


	{xen:property tagItem}
}

	@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 1.5dppx)
	{
		.tagList .tag
		{
			<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
			background-image: url("{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/tags-rtl-hd.png");
			<xen:else />
			background-image: url("{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/tags-hd.png");
			</xen:if>
		}
	}

	.tagList .tag:hover
	{
		{xen:property tagItemHover}
	}

	.tagList .tag .arrow,
	.tagList .tag:after
	{
		position: absolute;
		display: block;
		width: 15px;
		left: -15px;
		top: 0;
		bottom: 0;
		background: inherit;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-position: 0 -20px;
	}

		.tagList .tag:after
		{
			content: '';
			left: auto;
			right: -6px;
			width: 6px;
			background-position: {xen:if '{$pageIsRtl}', '-9px', '0'} -40px;
		}


	.tagList .tag:hover
	{
		background-position: 0 -60px;
	}

		.tagList .tag:hover .arrow
		{
			background-position: 0 -80px;
		}

		.tagList .tag:hover:after
		{
			background-position: {xen:if '{$pageIsRtl}', '-9px', '0'} -100px;
		}

.tagList + .tagBlockEdit:before
{
	content: '\f044';
	font-family: FontAwesome;
	padding: 0 2px;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper} && {$pageWidth} > 100">
@media (max-width:{xen:calc '{$pageWidth} + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-left}) + intval({xen:property globalWrapperLayout.padding-right})'}px)
{
	.Responsive .globalWrapper

		{xen:property globalWrapperLayoutMobile}

		}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})

	.Responsive .forum_view #pageDescription,

		display: none;
	}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth})

	.Responsive .titleBar .titleBarButtons

			margin-bottom: 10px;
		}
}

<xen:include template="xenforo_reset.css" />

/*
 * XenForo Core CSS
 *
 */

html
{
	{xen:property html}
	<xen:if is="{xen:property globalWrapper}">
	{xen:property wrappedHTML}
	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader}">
	{xen:property altHeaderPageLayout}
	</xen:if>
	</xen:if>

	min-height: 100%;
	overflow-y: scroll !important;
}

body
{
	-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
	-moz-text-size-adjust: 100%;
	-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
	text-size-adjust: 100%;
	min-height: 100%;
	
	{xen:property body}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property enableAlternativeHeader}">
	{xen:property altHeaderBodyLayout}
	</xen:if>
}

/* counteract the word-wrap setting in 'body' */
pre, textarea
{
	word-wrap: normal;
}

[dir=auto] { rtl-raw.text-align: {xen:if $pageIsRtl, right, left}; }

a:link,
a:visited
{
	{xen:property link}
}

	a[href]:hover
	{
		{xen:property linkHover}
	}
	
	a:hover
	{
		_text-decoration: {xen:property linkHover.text-decoration};
	}
	
	a.noOutline
	{
		outline: 0 none;
	}
	
	.emCtrl,
	.messageContent a
	{
	}
	
		.emCtrl:hover,
		.emCtrl:focus,
		.ugc a:hover,
		.ugc a:focus
		{
		}

	.ugc a:link,
	.ugc a:visited
	{
		{xen:property ugcLink}
	}
	
		.ugc a:hover,
		.ugc a:focus
		{
			{xen:property ugcLinkHover}
		}
		
img.mceSmilie,
img.mceSmilieSprite
{
	vertical-align: text-bottom;
	margin: 0 1px;
}
		
/** title bar **/

.titleBar
{
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

{xen:helper clearfix, '.titleBar'}

.titleBar h1
{
	{xen:property h1}
}

	.titleBar h1 em
	{
		color: {xen:property dimmedTextColor};
	}
		
	.titleBar h1 .Popup
	{
		float: left;
	}

<xen:if is="{xen:property hidePageTitleIndex}">
.forum_list .mainContent > .titleBar h1:first-child:last-child
{
	display: block;
	height: 0;
	padding: 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 0;
	background: none;
	border-width: 0;
	box-shadow: none;
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled = false);
}

	.forum_list .mainContent > .breadBoxTop + .titleBar h1:first-child:last-child
	{
		margin: -10px 0 0;
	}
</xen:if>

#pageDescription
{
	{xen:property pageDescription}
}

.topCtrl
{
	float: right;
}
	
	.topCtrl h2
	{
		font-size: 12pt;
	}
		
/** images **/

img
{
	-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">
.avatar 
{
	border-radius: 50%;
}

	.avatarCropper .avatar
	{
		border-radius: 0;
	}
</xen:if>

a.avatar 
{ 
	*cursor: pointer; /* IE7 refuses to do this */ 
} 

.avatar img,
.avatar .img,
.avatarCropper
{
	{xen:property avatar}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property roundedAvatars}">
	border-radius: 50% !important;
	border-width: 0;
	</xen:if>
}

.avatar.plainImage img,
.avatar.plainImage .img
{
	border: none;
	border-radius: 0;
	padding: 0;
	background-position: left top;
}

	.avatar .img
	{
		display: block;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-position: 50% 50%;
		text-indent: 1000px;
		overflow: hidden;
		white-space: nowrap;
		word-wrap: normal;
	}

	.avatar .img.s { width: 48px;  height: 48px;  }
	.avatar .img.m { width: 96px;  height: 96px;  }
	.avatar .img.l { width: 192px; height: 192px; }

.avatarCropper
{
	width: 192px;
	height: 192px;
	direction: ltr;
	border-radius: 0;
}

.avatarCropper a,
.avatarCropper span,
.avatarCropper label
{
	overflow: hidden;
	position: relative;
	display: block;
	width: 192px;
	height: 192px;
}

.avatarCropper img
{
	padding: 0;
	border: none;
	border-radius: 0 !important;

	position: relative;
	display: block;
}

	.currentAvatar img
	{
		border-radius: 0 !important;
	}

.avatarScaler img
{
	max-width: 192px;
	_width: 192px;

	border-radius: 0 !important;
}

.avatar img:-moz-broken
{
	opacity: 0;
}

/* ***************************** */

body .dimmed, body a.dimmed, body .dimmed a { color: {xen:property dimmedTextColor}; }
body .muted, body a.muted, body .muted a { color: {xen:property mutedTextColor}; }
body .faint, body a.faint, body .faint a { color: {xen:property faintTextColor}; }

.highlight { font-weight: bold; }

.concealed,
.concealed a,
.cloaked,
.cloaked a
{
	text-decoration: inherit !important;
	color: inherit !important;
	*clear:expression( style.color = parentNode.currentStyle.color, style.clear = "none", 0);
}

a.concealed:hover,
.concealed a:hover
{
	text-decoration: underline !important;
}

/* ***************************** */

.xenTooltip
{
	{xen:property tooltip}
}

.xenTooltip a,
.xenTooltip a:hover
{
	color: {xen:property tooltip.color};
	text-decoration: underline;
}

	.xenTooltip .arrow
	{
		{xen:property tooltipArrow}
		left: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tooltipArrow.border-top-width}) + 3'}px;
		
		/* Hide from IE6 */
		_display: none;
	}

	.xenTooltip.flipped .arrow
	{
		left: auto;
		right: {xen:calc 'intval({xen:property tooltipArrow.border-top-width}) + 3'}px;
	}

.xenTooltip.statusTip
{
	/* Generated by XenForo.StatusTooltip JavaScript */
	{xen:property statusTooltip}
}

	.xenTooltip.statusTip .arrow
	{
		{xen:property statusTooltipArrow}
	}
			
.xenTooltip.iconTip { margin-left: -6px; }
.xenTooltip.iconTip.flipped { margin-left: 7px; }

/* ***************************** */

#PreviewTooltip
{
	display: none;
}

.xenPreviewTooltip
{
	{xen:property previewTooltip}
	
	display: none;	
	z-index: 15000;
	cursor: default;
	
	border-color: {xen:helper rgba, {xen:property previewTooltip.border-color}, 0.5};
}

	.xenPreviewTooltip .arrow
	{
		{xen:property previewTooltipArrowOuter}
		
		_display: none;
	}
	
		.xenPreviewTooltip .arrow span
		{
			{xen:property previewTooltipArrowInner}
		}

	.xenPreviewTooltip .section,
	.xenPreviewTooltip .sectionMain,
	.xenPreviewTooltip .primaryContent,
	.xenPreviewTooltip .secondaryContent
	{
		margin: 0;
	}
	
		.xenPreviewTooltip .previewContent
		{
			overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
			min-height: 1em;
			border-radius: 0;
			box-shadow: none;
		}

/* ***************************** */

.importantMessage
{
	margin: 10px 0;

	{xen:property formValidationInlineError.font}
	{xen:property formValidationInlineError.background}
	{xen:property formValidationInlineError.border}

	text-align: center;
	font-size: 13px;
	font-weight: 500;
	padding: 10px;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

.importantMessage a
{
	font-weight: 600;
	color: inherit !important;
	text-decoration: underline;
}

/* ***************************** */

<xen:include template="xenforo_sections.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_columns.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_tabs.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_popup.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_overlay.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_alert.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_data_table.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_member_list_item.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_dismiss.css" />

<xen:include template="xenforo_basehtml.css" />

<xen:include template="page_nav.css" />

/* ***************************** */
/* DL Name-Value Pairs */

.pairs dt,
.pairsInline dt,
.pairsRows dt,
.pairsColumns dt,
.pairsJustified dt
{
	color: {xen:property mutedTextColor};
}

.pairsRows,
.pairsColumns,
.pairsJustified
{
	line-height: 1.5;
}

.pairsInline dl,
.pairsInline dt,
.pairsInline dd
{
	display: inline;
}

.pairsRows dt,
.pairsRows dd
{
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;

	*display: inline;
	*margin-right: 1ex;
	*zoom: 1;
}

dl.pairsColumns,
dl.pairsJustified,
.pairsColumns dl,
.pairsJustified dl
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
}

.pairsColumns dt,
.pairsColumns dd
{
	float: left;
	width: 48%;
}

.pairsJustified dt
{
	float: left;
	max-width: 100%;
	margin-right: 5px;
}
.pairsJustified dd
{
	float: right;
	text-align: right;
	max-width: 100%
}


/* ***************************** */
/* Lists that put all elements on a single line */

.listInline ul,
.listInline ol,
.listInline li,
.listInline dl,
.listInline dt,
.listInline dd
{
	display: inline;
}

/* intended for use with .listInline, produces 'a, b, c, d' / 'a * b * c * d' lists */

.commaImplode li:after,
.commaElements > *:after
{
	content: ', ';
}

.commaImplode li:last-child:after,
.commaElements > *:last-child:after
{
	content: '';
}

.bulletImplode li:before
{
	content: '\2022\a0';
}

.bulletImplode li:first-child:before
{
	content: '';
}

/* Three column list display */

.threeColumnList
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
}

.threeColumnList li
{
	float: left;
	width: 32%;
	margin: 2px 1% 2px 0;
}

.twoColumnList
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
}

.twoColumnList li
{
	float: left;
	width: 48%;
	margin: 2px 1% 2px 0;
}

/* ***************************** */
/* Preview tooltips (threads etc.) */

.previewTooltip
{
}
		
	.previewTooltip .avatar
	{
		float: left;
	}
	
	.previewTooltip .text
	{
		margin-left: 64px;
	}
	
		.previewTooltip blockquote
		{
			{xen:property messageText}
			
			font-size: 10pt;
			max-height: 150px;
			overflow: hidden;
		}
	
		.previewTooltip .posterDate
		{
			font-size: 11px;
			padding-top: 6px;
			border-top: 1px solid {xen:property innerBottomBorder};
			margin-top: 5px;
			position: relative;
		}

			.previewTooltip .posterDate:after
			{
				content: '';
				position: absolute;
				display: block;
				left: 0;
				right: 0;
				top: 0;
				border-top: 1px solid {xen:property innerTopBorder};
			}

/* ***************************** */
/* List of block links */

.blockLinksList
{
	{xen:property blockLinksList}
}
		
	.blockLinksList a,
	.blockLinksList label
	{
		{xen:property blockLinksListItem}
	}
	
		.blockLinksList a:hover,
		.blockLinksList a:focus,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect a,
		.blockLinksList label:hover,
		.blockLinksList label:focus,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect label,
		.subForumsMenu .blockLinksList li.node .nodeTitle a:hover
		{
			{xen:property blockLinksListItemHover}
		}
		
		.blockLinksList a:active,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect a:active,
		.blockLinksList a.selected,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect a.selected,
		.blockLinksList label:active,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect label:active,
		.blockLinksList label.selected,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect label.selected
		{
			{xen:property blockLinksListItemActive}
		}
		
		.blockLinksList a.selected,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect a.selected,
		.blockLinksList label.selected,
		.blockLinksList li.kbSelect label.selected
		{
			{xen:property blockLinksListItemSelected}
		}
		
		.blockLinksList span.depthPad
		{
			display: block;
		}

.blockLinksList .itemCount
{
	{xen:property alertBalloon}

	float: right;
	position: relative;
	right: 0;
	top: -1px;
}

	.blockLinksList .itemCount.Zero
	{
		display: none;
	}

.bubbleLinksList
{
	overflow: hidden;
}

.bubbleLinksList a
{
	float: left;
	padding: 2px 4px;
	margin-right: 2px;
	border-radius: 3px;
	text-decoration: none;
}
	
	.bubbleLinksList a:hover,
	.bubbleLinksList a:active
	{
		{xen:property blockLinksListItemHover}
	}
	
	.bubbleLinksList a.active
	{
		{xen:property blockLinksListItemActive}
		{xen:property blockLinksListItemSelected}
	}

/* ***************************** */
/* Normally-indented nested lists */

.indentList ul,
.indentList ol
{
	margin-left: 2em;
}

/* ***************************** */
/* AJAX progress image */

.InProgress
{
	background: transparent url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/widgets/ajaxload.info_B4B4DC_facebook.gif') no-repeat right center;
}

/* ***************************** */
/* Hidden inline upload iframe */

.hiddenIframe
{
	display: block;
	width: 500px;
	height: 300px;
}

/* ***************************** */
/* Exception display */

.traceHtml { font-size:11px; font-family:calibri, verdana, arial, sans-serif; }
.traceHtml .function { color:rgb(180,80,80); font-weight:normal; }
.traceHtml .file { font-weight:normal; }
.traceHtml .shade { color:rgb(128,128,128); }
.traceHtml .link { font-weight:bold; }

/* ***************************** */
/* Indenting for options */

._depth0 { padding-left:  0em; }
._depth1 { padding-left:  2em; }
._depth2 { padding-left:  4em; }
._depth3 { padding-left:  6em; }
._depth4 { padding-left:  8em; }
._depth5 { padding-left: 10em; }
._depth6 { padding-left: 12em; }
._depth7 { padding-left: 14em; }
._depth8 { padding-left: 16em; }
._depth9 { padding-left: 18em; }

<xen:include template="error.css" />

/* Undo some nasties */

input[type=search]
{
	-webkit-appearance: textfield;
	box-sizing: content-box;
}

/* ignored content hiding */

.ignored { display: none !important; }

/* Misc */

.floatLeft { float: left; }
.floatRight { float: right; }

.horizontalContain { overflow-x: auto; }

.ltr { direction: ltr; }

i.glyphicons:before { padding: 0; }

/* Square-cropped thumbs */

.SquareThumb
{
	position: relative;
	display: block;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 0;
	direction: ltr;
	
	/* individual instances can override this size */
	width: 48px;
	height: 48px;
}

.SquareThumb img
{
	position: relative;
	display: block;
}

<xen:include template="bb_code_base.css" />

.visibleResponsiveFull { display: inherit !important; }

.visibleResponsiveWide,
.visibleResponsiveMedium,
.visibleResponsiveNarrow { display: none !important; }

.hiddenResponsiveFull { display: none !important; } 

.hiddenResponsiveWide,
.hiddenResponsiveMedium,
.hiddenResponsiveNarrow { display: inherit !important; }

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	.Responsive .visibleResponsiveFull { display: none !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenResponsiveFull { display: inherit !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenWideUnder { display: none !important; }
}

@media (min-width:{xen:calc '{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth} + 1'}px) AND (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	.Responsive .visibleResponsiveWide { display: inherit !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenResponsiveWide { display: none !important; }
}

@media (min-width:{xen:calc '{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth} + 1'}px) AND (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})
{
	.Responsive .visibleResponsiveMedium { display: inherit !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenResponsiveMedium { display: none !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenWideUnder,
	.Responsive .hiddenMediumUnder { display: none !important; }
}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth})
{
	.Responsive .visibleResponsiveNarrow { display: inherit !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenResponsiveNarrow { display: none !important; }
	
	.Responsive .hiddenWideUnder,
	.Responsive .hiddenMediumUnder,
	.Responsive .hiddenNarrowUnder { display: none !important; }
}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})
{
	.Responsive .threeColumnList li
	{
		float: none;
		width: auto;
		margin: 2px 1% 2px 0;
	}
}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth})
{
	.Responsive .xenTooltip.statusTip
	{
		width: auto;
	}
	
	.Responsive .xenPreviewTooltip
	{
		box-sizing: border-box;
		width: auto;
		max-width: 100%;
	}
	
	.Responsive .xenPreviewTooltip .arrow
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .previewTooltip .avatar
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .previewTooltip .text
	{
		margin-left: 0;
	}
}
</xen:if>

<xen:hook name="xenforo_css_extra" />

<xen:comment> <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.xengalleryFontAwesome}"> <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.xengalleryFontAwesome} == 'all' OR ({$xenOptions.xengalleryFontAwesome} == 'gallery' AND {xen:helper xmgtemplate, $contentTemplate}) OR {$override}"> <link href="//maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet"> </xen:if> </xen:if> </xen:comment>

<xen:include template="xengallery_advanced_select.css" />

.inputIconContainer
{
	margin-top: -5px;
}

.inputIconContainer .textCtrl.iconInput
{
	width: 75%!important;
}

.full.textCtrl.iconInput
{
	width: 100%;
}

.inputIconContainer .button.smallButton.toolButton
{
	width: 25px;
	height: 25px;
	line-height: 25px;
	margin: 0px 3px 5px 0;
	padding: 0;
}

.pairsColumns.quotaPairs
{
	font-size: 11px;
}

.editMediaContainer
{
	zoom: 1;
	overflow: hidden;
}

	.editMediaContainer > .primaryContent
	{
		border-width: 0;
		border-radius: 0;
		background: none;
		box-shadow: none;
		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled = false);
	}

#VideoPreviewArea
{
	min-height: 340px;
	display: none;
}

.VideoPreviewContainer
{
	zoom: 1;
	overflow: hidden;
}

.VideoPreviewSubmitUnit
{
	display: block;
}

.AttachmentEditor,
.VideoPreviewContainer
{
	zoom: 1;
	overflow: hidden;
	clear: both;
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile
{
	display: none;
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .ProgressMeter
{
	display: block;
	padding: 2px;
	border: 1px solid {xen:property primaryLighter};
	border-radius: 4px;
	background-color: {xen:property content.background-color};
	margin-bottom: 5px;
	font-size: 14pt;
	line-height: 26px;
	width: 100%;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .ProgressMeter .ProgressGraphic
{
	display: inline-block;
	width: 0%;
	height: 26px;
	background: {xen:property primaryLight} url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/gradients/category-23px-light.png') repeat-x top;
	text-align: right;
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .ProgressMeter .ProgressCounter
{
	display: inline-block;
	height: 26px;
	padding: 0 10px;
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .ProgressMeter .ProgressGraphic .ProgressCounter
{
	color: {xen:property primaryLightest};
}

.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .AttachmentDeleter,
.AttachmentEditor .AttachedFile .AttachmentCanceller
{
	float: right;
	display: none;
	margin-right: 4px;
}

/* SWFUploader placeholder */

.swfupload
{
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 9997 !important;
	opacity: 0;
}

/* Uploader JS Overlay */

.xenOverlay.attachmentUploader
{
	max-width: 500px;
}

.attachmentUploader #ctrl_upload
{
	margin: 2px auto 5px;
}

.attachmentUploader .attachmentConstraints dl
{
	margin-top: 2px;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.AttachmentList.New
{
	margin-left: 0;
}

.AttachedFilesUnit .submitUnit,
.VideoPreviewSubmitUnit.submitUnit
{
	border-top: none;
}

.itemRow
{
	overflow: hidden;
	zoom: 1;
	margin: 10px 0;
}

.itemRow .Thumbnail
{
	float: left;
}

.collapsed.itemRow .Thumbnail
{
	max-width: 100px;
	transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
}

.expanded.itemRow .Thumbnail
{
	max-width: 180px;
	transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
}

.itemRow .Thumbnail img
{
	max-width: 100%;
	border-radius: 5px;
}

.itemRow .itemFooter
{
	margin-top: 5px;
}

.collapsed.itemRow .itemInputs,
.collapsed.itemRow .itemFooter
{
	margin-left: 105px;
	transition: margin .2s ease-in-out;
}

.expanded.itemRow .itemInputs,
.expanded.itemRow .itemFooter
{
	margin-left: 190px;
	transition: margin .2s ease-in-out;
}

.itemRow .itemInputs .textCtrl
{
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 100%;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	resize: none;
}

.itemRow .itemInputs input.textCtrl
{
	margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.itemRow .itemExtraInput .ctrlUnit.surplusLabel dt label
{
	display: inline-block;
	margin-left: 0;
}

.itemRow .itemExtraInput .ctrlUnit.surplusLabel dt dfn
{
	float: right;
	margin-right: -15px;
}

.leftControls
{
	float: left;
}

.leftControls .item
{
	margin-left: 10px;
	float: left;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.rightControls
{
	float: right;
}

.rightControls .item
{
	margin-right: 10px;
	float: left;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.itemRow .itemFooter .button.AttachmentDeleter:before,
.itemRow .itemFooter .button.DeleteVideo:before
{
	font-size: 1.33333333em;
	line-height: .75em;
	vertical-align: -15%;

	font-family: FontAwesome;
	content: "\f014";
}

.itemRow .itemExtraInput
{
	display: none;
}

.itemRow .itemExtraInput.editPage
{
	display: block;
}

.itemRow .itemExtraInput .fullWidth.surplusLabel dd
{
	width: 100%;
	padding: 0;
	float: left;
}

.itemRow .itemFooter .quotaMessage
{
	margin-top: -4px;
}

.quotaMessage
{
	border: 1px solid {xen:property primaryLighterStill};
	border-radius: 5px;
	font-size: 11px;
	margin: 10px 0;
	padding: 5px;
	line-height: 16px;
	background-image: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/gradients/form-button-white-25px.png');
}

.quotaMessage dt
{
	color: {xen:property primaryLight};
	display: inline;
}

.quotaMessage dd
{
	color: {xen:property primaryDark};
	display: inline;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth})
{
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .Thumbnail
	{
		max-width: 100px;
	}
	
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .itemInputs,
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .itemFooter
	{
		margin-left: 105px;
	}
}

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth})
{
	.Responsive .xenForm .ctrlUnit.chooserUnit > dd
	{
		overflow: visible;
	}
	
	.Responsive .collapsed.itemRow .Thumbnail,
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .Thumbnail
	{
		max-width: 75px;
	}
	
	.Responsive .collapsed.itemRow .itemInputs,
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .itemInputs,
	.Responsive .collapsed.itemRow .itemFooter,
	.Responsive .expanded.itemRow .itemFooter
	{
		margin-left: 80px;
	}
}
</xen:if>

{xen:phrase xengallery_albums}:

{xen:number $xenCache.xengalleryStatisticsCache.upload_count}
{xen:phrase xengallery_embedded_media}:
{xen:number $xenCache.xengalleryStatisticsCache.embed_count}
{xen:phrase xengallery_comments}:
